story:
WEEKLY UPDATES*
Scroll down to see backer reward emblems*

"The Galaxy is your Battlefield"

The fate of the galaxy is at stake in this fast paced action packed, next generation, space battle game. Online, PvP, 30 v 30 space dog fights attempting to destroy the enemies Capital ship as you defend your own. Providing the player with full ship and weapon customization and upgrades with unique game modes and Galactic events that can completely change the course of  battle. 

30v30 PvP
Unique Game modes
Epic scale maps
Immersive flight controls
Unique Camera views
Game pad and joystick support
Full customization of players ships
Tier RPG based upgrade system
All DLC and expansions completely FREE

"We are aiming to create fast paced dynamic space battles on an epic scale as seen in popular TV shows and movies such as Star Wars and Battlestar Galactica"
Bringing you  30 v 30 PvP space battles taking place on huge open space areas, Fast paced gameplay, immersive flight controls with team objectives which relay on teamwork and communication to complete to further aid your chances for victory. 

* early render of first default Spaceship (Above)

Assault

Assault is the main game mode of Galactic Warfare and we believe that its a unique game mode, In Assault the main objective is to destroy the opposing forces and their main capital ship as well as defending your own. There is a reinforcement based system for each team starting at 500, this declines as players die (1 death per reinforcement) but destroying the enemies capital ship will prevent  reinforcements completely which means the players wont be able to re spawn. This makes teamwork and communication vital to get a victory. Who ever destroys the enemies  capital ship will most probably be victorious, but you never know how the battle will play out.

Completing secondary missions will grant you more reinforcements as well as individual experience points, which could be the deciding factor on who gets victory, so in a team you can have a few players depleting the the enemies reinforcements while others work on objectives to gain reinforcements for your team. So breaking it down, 1 squadron can be attacking the enemy fighter ships to stop them completing objectives and attacking your own ships, while another squadron attacks the  capital ship as your squadron works on completing the objectives, this is why we believe in teamwork and communication is important. 

Classic Team Deathmatch

no twists, no capital ships, just classic team versus team in a head on space battle, which ever team  has the most kills in the given time is victorious.

Free for all  

limited to only 20 players and taking place in smaller parts of the universe this mode is to really prove who is the best pilot in the galaxy

Taking down the capital ship is no easy task, for one the capital ship is gigantic!. Its not as simple as you would think it to be. You have to think tactically on what part of the ship you want to destroy first, within your team you have to decide which is more important. For the capital ship to take damage you have to destroy its shields by destroying the shield array, once the shields are down you then have a few choices to make, do you want to go in for the kill and destroy the capital ship as quickly as possible, which can be difficult with the enemy fighter ships attacking you, or you can try and get an advantage on the other team.

The options you have are that you can destroy the command tower which will wipe out all communications for the other team, they will not be able to talk to other team members restricting them to only having communication with squad members as your ships have local communication antennas. 

The capital ship has a huge arsenal of turrets which can do alot of damage to your ships or more importantly your teams capital ship, as the two capital ship are slowly moving closer to one another,  you can prevent this by destroying the generators which power the turrets (each generator powers 2-4 turrets).

You can make the enemies capital ship vulnerable by destroying its engines which will prevent it from moving towards your capital ship, in addition to that you can make the ship rotate and lose complete control by destroying its gravitation gyro which will cause the ship to slowly tilt and gradually start to spin and float away. 

Unlock blueprints and earn credits to purchase your ships parts and weapons, upgrade your ships armour, shields, wings, engines and weapons with our 3 tier system and have the ability to fully customise your ships, you have full control of the following:
Primary and secondary colours
Decals
Clan Emblem
Lights
Shield colour and pattern
Thruster Colour
Plasma ammunition
Apply Skins (Exclusive skin packs or purchase skin packs)

You are able to team up with your mates to form your on fighter squadron and even form your own clan and to create your own clan emblem to place on your ship to wear with pride. 
We are introducing a voice and text system to be able to communicate with your team mates as well as your squad and even have your own private clan channel. However this can change throughout the game if your communication array has been destroyed.

We are working very hard to allow players to choose between third or first person cockpit views. At first third person is only available but first person cockpit view is milestone we are very keen on achieving at an early stage. Eventually introducing the game to VR ( Virtual Reality) cockpits. We believe that VR is the future of space games and are very passionate about it.

Along with our unique game mode we are introducing random galactic events, space is a naturally dangerous place, with this understanding we have created game changing events which happen randomly throughout the assault game mode which can catch you of guard and  have devastating effects on the games outcome. 

Meteor Shower

Fairly obvious to what this event does.  Meteor showers occur when a comet comes close to a star and produces debris - meteoroids. 
Just as your flying around you may hear a loud rumble then you look up to see hundreds of meteoroids hurly towards your team destroying anything its path. The only thing you can do is dodge them and hope they pass quickly.

Supernova

A supernova is a enormous explosion that briefly outshines an entire galaxy, radiating as much energy as a star emits over its entire life span. The extremely luminous burst of radiation expels much or all of a star's material at a velocity of up to 30,000 km/s (10% of the speed of light), driving a shock wave into the surrounding area. 
You will get a  warning before this event happens, you may notice a dying star imploding in the vary far distance then in a matter of seconds you will be blinded by light followed by a huge shock wave which will make you ship fly out of control and throwing asteroids and any debris with it. the only thing you can do is to hold on tight and hope nothings hits your ship. 

Titan 

Titans are the biggest spaceship known to mankind, shadowing any capital ship and was built for one purpose, DESTRUCTION! 
Out of know where a titan ship can appear, as you stare while in shock of its over whelming size it will fire its main weapon across the area not caring which team it hits. This is truly devastating and has the biggest impact in the game but it is also the rarest of the events.
We are using the new Substance Live package to produce the next generation of materials, PBR (Physically Based Renders) this was a huge leap for us at Polymorphik Games and it has paid of well. Using this software has enable us to do so much more than we ever anticipated. Substance Designer and Substance Painter work really well within Unity 5, our engine of choice, also Space looks amazing using Unity 5's built in global illumination and our 4k textures. 



See perks page to see the rewards

The team at Polymorphik Games really appreciates any support given and we aim to do our best to reach the final goal
Licensed Software
3DsMax - Substance Live - Photoshop - Unity 3D - Photon - VR
Marketing
Audio
EGX Eurogamer
Rezzed
Further improvements to the game

Milestones
Additional Voice Actors - $20k
More Content - Weapon and ship blueprints - $25k
Skin Packs - $30k
Additional Languages - $35k
Single Player Training missions with AI and voice actors - $40k
Commander Second Screen - $45k
Surface Battles - $50k
VR - $60k
PS4 + Xbox One including console VR - $65k
Mac OSX and Linux Support - $70k

Additional Information
Additional Voice Actors: More voices for the ships AI
Additional Languages: ES, FR, IT, PL, RU, GER ( Launch is in English)
Commander Second Screen: Enable the player to use a tablet or mobile device to view the map of a current game in real time and give orders to the team
Skin Pack: Personalise your ship with skin packs which will be available to buy on the in game store or online. These packs will include themed skins eg. Halloween and Christmas. Also have international flags packs etc

Polymorhik Games is a small independent company focused on unique multi-genre games across numerous platforms and system software. Our aim is to create interactive experiences in which the player goes on an unforgettable journey. We focus on the gamer’s experience, not making money. This is our philosophy, we are willing to take more time to make a game than to rush out a half made game.

We promise to always do our best and focus on the gamers. As gamers and developers, we promise to always ensure you are not getting drained of your money, we just want to make games so we can escape to amazing worlds and take on new personas and meet others alike.

At PolymorphiK Games, we promise to always now and forever to put gamers first no matter what and you can hold us accountable for it. Together we will create new worlds, explore them, learn from them and create friends along the way in order to accomplish our quest.

Now, lets play some games!

The Team

Kevin Pacheco - CEO / Head Software Engineer

Alex Curtis - Co-Founder / Game director / Lead artist

Adam Stockton - Art Director / 3D Modeller 
Anna Marynczak - Concept Artist / Illustrator 
Agatha Vermeil - 3D Modeller / UI Artist
Join the team! 
PolyMorphik Games are looking for new Artist
Details
http://polycount.com/discussion/163035/polymorphik-games-looking-for-new-artists-unpaid-until-published#latest
Steam Greenlight
We are on Steam Greenlight - link coming soon
FAQ* coming soon
Huge thanks from the whole team!!

story:
1

 


 

 

 

 

 

   

 

Kanji 2D uses a neural network algorithm to recognize your handwriting.

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 


I've been developing this game since mid january 2018.

The game went through a lot of changes during this time. Starting as a simple mobile
app and now established as a interactive semi-open world puzzle game.

After investing a couple of years studying the japanese language
I caught myself bored and unmotivated while learning Kanji.

There are a lot of good games and alternative resources to learn Hiragana, 
but when comes to Kanji there are not a lot of options.

So I had the idea to combine two of my favorite games, Okami and Scribblenauts.

I couldn't find help to produce the game, so I had to make everything by myself. 
As a programmer I really struggle in the art department, so that explain the simple graphics of Kanji 2D.

During this time of production, I've been tweaking the game design, rewritten the base code a couple of times and  changed the art style from pixel art to minimalistic black and white vectors.

I decided to launch this campaign so I can afford to work with good graphic artists 
so I can focus on the programming and level design parts of the development, which are my specialty.


 

 

 

 

 

 

Direct Contact:

https://twitter.com/alexfzk

https://www.facebook.com/kanji2d

story:
Up until now we financed the development of Race In The Galaxy with contract works and side jobs. Now we finally want to show you what the game is all about and ask for your support so we can start to work on our dream full-time!

We are a team of 3, and with Indiegogo we want to raise funds to finish the development of our game with the quality that it deserves. Please read on to know more about it.

If you don't know what Indiegogo is: you can support us by buying the perks listed on the side and you will receive everything listed on your perk when those things get finished.

Please read on to know more about the game, the team and the prizes!

 

Have you ever imagined what would be like a Formula One championship a thousand years from now? This is the main premise behind the RITG story.

Instead of Austria GP, we have Mars GP. But the space travel is so advanced that the human race reached all the galaxy. A new championship was made where every year the best pilots of the galaxy are gathered on a huge spaceship.

This spaceship holds all the team manufacturers, staff people, pilots, journalists, and so on. It is like a city that moves from planet to planet every other week.

It is in this context that all the game events happens. There will be events occurring while you are on the ship. Industrial spies, saboteurs, and all that.

Every year the planets participating on the championship changes. The pilots never know what challenges expects them. (You can keep playing after finishing the championship)

Welcome to the Race In The Galaxy Championship.

TLDR; read the bold text.

The game can be divided into 2 parts: Inside and outside the cockpit.

You will start your campaign creating your character. You will choose a name and appearance.

This character is not famous (yet), so you have to prove yourself on a minor championship (tutorial) in order to get attention from the big teams on the RITG.

(you can always skip the tutorial and go directly to the team choosing part)

In each new game, the teams will have different names, colors, logos, preferred car, and technology level. Depending on your difficulty settings, you will get a list of teams with more or less popularity and technology levels.

You will start as a "secondary" pilot, and sometimes you will be asked by your team to let your partner, the primary pilot, to finish in front of you.

Depending on your decisions to accept or disobey your team, and the different outcomes (get at first or last place, for example), your relationship with your team and partner will be altered.

These relationships will affect directly on the different random events that might happen between the races.

Eventually some other pilot will become your rival. This will be a character that will receive special attention on your interviews with journalists, and it will affect some random events, impacting on your popularity.

The game has a procedural technology system, and the way you get new techs is by keeping your team popularity high. This represents the money received from sponsors.

In order to gain popularity, you need to win races and stay out of trouble (or not).

Now, inside the cockpit.

The game will feature 10 different cars, with different attributes.

These attributes are: Speed, Acceleration, Turning and Defense.

Each car will give you a unique way to play the game. You can try to destroy your opponents, keep your advantage on long straights, play carefully trying not to crash... It all depends on your attributes, technology, skills and modifiers.

 

The way you control your car is different from a normal racing game, because your car is floating on the air. You will have to think in zero gravity. If you stop accelerating and turn your car, it will keep going forward, until you accelerate again. This means that your break/reverse is a backwards impulse.

The game will feature car explosions and pilot deaths. Be careful.

 

Development: All the programming and game design. This will enable Vinicius to work on the game as a full time job.

Illustration: All the characters and scenes used in the game will be handmade to fit this beautiful universe. This will enable Michele to work on the game as a part time job.

Soundtrack: All the musics will be unique to the game and will represent the mood on each type of planet. Daniel will take care of this.

Licenses + others: Software licenses such as Unity Plus and other stuff, like the Steam Greenlight fee.

Fees: Indiegogo and payment processing fees.

 

Name in credits under Turtle Tribe: Your name will be on the credits of the game in the Turtle Tribe category.

Name in credits in a special section: Your name will be bigger and displayed on a special section, before the Turtle Tribe section.

Steam Key: A key to be redeemed on Steam. This is the game.

Additional Steam Key: A secondary key to be redeemed on Steam. You can give it to a friend as a gift if you want.

Early Access Steam Key: A key to be redeemed on Steam that will enable early access (beta). You will be able to play the game before it is finished.

Itens from the Gold pack:

Digital Artbook: A PDF containing the art from the game. All the concept art, sketches, story behind some of the art decisions and all that.

Short Story: A PDF / EPUB / MOBI short story that happens inside the game universe.

Digital Poster: A high resolution image for you to use how you want. You can print it as a poster, or use it as a beautiful wallpaper.

Name in the game: Your name (or something else) as a pilot name on the game. The name needs to fit the game lore.

Squad: This is a special title in the community. You will be differentiated from the others as a Squad member, with a different color and the ability to enter on squad only text and voice channels on our discord server. You will also receive the right to vote on polls created by us, concerning the development of the game.

Digital Avatar Image: A custom avatar drawn by Michele, our concept artist. She will draw you based on a real photo, and you will look like a character from the game. You will receive a JPG image.

Create a custom event: You will be able to work with us and create a custom event that will happen between each race.

VIP: You will receive the VIP status on the community. This will give you the right to visit our offices and hang out with us, if you happen to be on our city. Also, you will receive all future games from us for free.

 

If we reach our goal, we will be able to launch the early access in the end of the first semester of 2017, and the full game on the second semester of 2017.

If we don't reach our initial goal, we will still be completing the game, but we can't promise any dates, because it will depend on how much we have raised. More info about this on the Risks and Challenges section.

Concerning Mac and Linux:

We are aware that most projects promise things that they are not sure if they can deliver. We are not going to do this. The Mac and Linux versions eventually will be release, but only after the main release for PC.

We think that it is better to focus our efforts on a single platform first, make it bug free, and then move to another platform.

The obvious risk is if we do not achieve the campaign goal. If this happens, we will prioritize the payment of the soundtrack and software licenses. The developer might need to take a part time job to earn some money while working on the game as a second part time job. The concept artist might need to change her role to be a freelancer, instead of a collaborator.

This means that the production of the game will take more time to finish, that's why we can't promise an exact release date. But we will NOT STOP.

We have managed to get here, starting from nothing. We overcame a lot of challenges, and they are never easy, but with determination and hard work we believe that we can overcome this risk.

We value transparency. If something goes wrong, the community will always be notified.

 

We know that the dollar may be a hard issue for some. But if you still want to help in some way, you can share this campaign by clicking on the share buttons at the side of the video.

You can use the #RITG hashtag!

You also can talk to your friends that might like our project. If you do so, it will mean a lot for us! Help us spread RITG all over the world!

If you have ANY questions at all, please use the comments section and we will answer.

Thank you! <3
story_txt:
Up until now we financed the development of Race In The Galaxy with contract works and side jobs. Now we finally want to show you what the game is all about and ask for your support so we can start to work on our dream full-time!
We are a team of 3, and with Indiegogo we want to raise funds to finish the development of our game with the quality that it deserves. Please read on to know more about it.
If you don't know what Indiegogo is: you can support us by buying the perks listed on the side and you will receive everything listed on your perk when those things get finished.
Please read on to know more about the game, the team and the prizes!
 


Have you ever imagined what would be like a Formula One championship a thousand years from now? This is the main premise behind the RITG story.
Instead of Austria GP, we have Mars GP. But the space travel is so advanced that the human race reached all the galaxy. A new championship was made where every year the best pilots of the galaxy are gathered on a huge spaceship.
This spaceship holds all the team manufacturers, staff people, pilots, journalists, and so on. It is like a city that moves from planet to planet every other week.
It is in this context that all the game events happens. There will be events occurring while you are on the ship. Industrial spies, saboteurs, and all that.
Every year the planets participating on the championship changes. The pilots never know what challenges expects them. (You can keep playing after finishing the championship)
Welcome to the Race In The Galaxy Championship.


TLDR; read the bold text.
The game can be divided into 2 parts: Inside and outside the cockpit.
You will start your campaign creating your character. You will choose a name and appearance.
This character is not famous (yet), so you have to prove yourself on a minor championship (tutorial) in order to get attention from the big teams on the RITG.
(you can always skip the tutorial and go directly to the team choosing part)

In each new game, the teams will have different names, colors, logos, preferred car, and technology level. Depending on your difficulty settings, you will get a list of teams with more or less popularity and technology levels.
You will start as a "secondary" pilot, and sometimes you will be asked by your team to let your partner, the primary pilot, to finish in front of you.
Depending on your decisions to accept or disobey your team, and the different outcomes (get at first or last place, for example), your relationship with your team and partner will be altered.
These relationships will affect directly on the different random events that might happen between the races.

Eventually some other pilot will become your rival. This will be a character that will receive special attention on your interviews with journalists, and it will affect some random events, impacting on your popularity.

The game has a procedural technology system, and the way you get new techs is by keeping your team popularity high. This represents the money received from sponsors.
In order to gain popularity, you need to win races and stay out of trouble (or not).
Now, inside the cockpit.

The game will feature 10 different cars, with different attributes.
These attributes are: Speed, Acceleration, Turning and Defense.
Each car will give you a unique way to play the game. You can try to destroy your opponents, keep your advantage on long straights, play carefully trying not to crash... It all depends on your attributes, technology, skills and modifiers.
 
The way you control your car is different from a normal racing game, because your car is floating on the air. You will have to think in zero gravity. If you stop accelerating and turn your car, it will keep going forward, until you accelerate again. This means that your break/reverse is a backwards impulse.
The game will feature car explosions and pilot deaths. Be careful.

story:
The Triangle is an action-based, survival, horror game. You can play as one of few characters and experience their horrifying story. The game consists of few episodes and each of them is based on real stories. 

We don´t have the last 3D technologie, but our story is grinding ...




 

 [ Our resources can be found in​ ]
 

 

and not only !

 



The Triangle takes a completely different approach to locations, characters and main story itself. We are inspired by many interesting stories and our goal is to use best ideas and introduce them into our game. The very point of every scenarion is to give players very detailed environment and interensting, coherent story which makes them feel as they would be the character. With our work progess we will keep adding more and more scenarios.


We are trying to create dynamic, horrifying and unparalleled world full of features as puzzles, riddles, secret locations, collecting system and with you progressing unlocking new stories.



There is a group of people engaged into our project just to make the game more interesting and enhance every single of its aspects. Our goal is to satify every possible player, those who love horrifying and bloody stories full of dead bodies and carnage and those who enjoy realistic environment with well-optimized graphics and audio that is worth listening in every second of gameplay.



In a process of creating a new level of graphic design we are using "Motion Capture" system. We will do our best to let you see the best graphics in this genre.


We are intending to publish The Triangle on Windows, PS3, PS4, Xbox One. We have big dreams but we ar enot capable of doing so without your support, this is why we are asking you to help us, in return we are promising to make this game unforgettable.

Sadist - Sergeant John Cooper is sent to investigate strange noises coming from one of tenements. He finds that there is something more waiting for him.

Dyatlow Pass - well-trained alpinist Anre Kolevatow, his task it to find missing alpinists who never came back it to their camp.

Slender - Michael Booth is a boy who survived close encounter with Slenderman. This story is different from previous ones. We can say that Slenderman is a normal men with complicated personality but not some monster with tentacles.

Strangers - Peaceful family spends quiet evening at home, they are disturbed by unexpected guests. At first glance guests are normal, but we have all been deceived.

story:
Short Summary

We can't tell the difference between real and virtual anymore. If it's not online, it's not real. So let's make the realest thing we can: a virtual country! 

We're starting Showupia: a virtual nation built from scratch where you're in power. It's a phone game that let's you connect face-to-face and capture politicians like pokemon. 

Showupia is innovating on civic engagement. It's a map-based game that lets everyday people decide what's next. Power is shared and people own the politicians - literally! It's the only ultimate-reality, choose-your-own-adventure, upside-down democracy game. It helps people showup where it counts: not just to vote, but also to community meetings, local protests, and the halls of power. 

The Gameplay

consists of two main parts: 
1) Walk around the real world and gain Influence by waking up Sheeple and catching pocket politicians. Vote at them or literally shout at them to put the politician in your pocket. For more Influence, contact the real politician after you've owned them. 
2) Build Power (access and control over the game) by "collaborating" face-to-face with friends and neighbors. The higher your Power level, the more you decide the future of the nation. Kind of like being a Wikipedia moderator

What We Need & What You Get

We’re designing this WITH you, but you won't have to do any work unless you want to. The game makes it easy to have your voice heard.

Claim your land in Showupia by becoming an investor and testing the game. Our rewards let you put yourself in the game - literally! To be a Sidekick, throw in $10 to help beta-test and nation-build. For $25, you become a Diplomat and can put yourself (or any gif you want) as a character in the game. For $50, you become a Superhero and get all that and a cape! For $100, you are UnFucking Believable: adopt a politician and decide how they look in the game. You can make them fabulous, or you can make them a steaming turd. Up to you!

If you want your brand to be part of the nation of Showupia (and get to use the game to help focus group, recruit, and put your events on the map), it’s $1000 to be a Visionary Power Brand. Only for the highly inspired!

As much as we hate asking for money, it’s a sad reality of capitalism. If we want to make something new, we need the dough to make it so. But that’s why we’re going to you instead of sucking up to corporations or big investors. We are shooting to raise $15,000 to cover the costs of this campaign and finish the development of the app, which includes:

  • Changing the app to reflect testing feedback.
  • Running the app and web hosting
  • Campaign costs: graphic design, video production, social media marketing, website, fonts, promo materials, and community events to get the word out
  • Trademarks and copyright
  • Our stretch goals:
    • If we reach over $30,000, we’ll create a co-op LLC where you (yes, YOU!) literally own the game with the rest of the community.
    • If we reach over $50,000, we'll create an open-source brand that chooses what we want to make and sends you community-decided products (along with a political dare/mission) each month.

If we don’t reach our goal, the costs will go towards covering the campaign costs. We will reassess and see how else we can get funds to develop during testing, but the prototype WILL be completed by the end of summer.

Impact

Showupia lets people take advantage of the blurred line between real and virtual to craft a new political culture in the streets and on phones simultaneously. We get it... politics blows. We’re not denying it. But in this world of crazy political theater and lives controlled by the Gram, we are adding some authenticity and humanity. Instead of trying to dismantle the system or hopeless incremental change, we are building a new system that works. 

The idea for Showupia was sparked in 2016 when Pokemon Go was in full force during the worst election of our lives. Sam Bonar (aka Filiblaster, Showupia's Chief Sidekick) was blown away by a silly game’s ability to start a tiny revolution. People unintentionally got off their butts, in the streets, and made community easily and spontaneously. Simply by having a location-based game where the map is the real world, people naturally interacted in new ways. So here's an AR ecosystem designed with intention to make it easy to go where it counts. This is especially powerful for people living in DC who can show up in the face of power, but have no say in national politics.

This isn’t just another app owned by corporations sucking your eyeballs, data, and hard-earned cash out your pocket. This is a diy chance to play the game of power and have your voice heard as a collective roar. Become a grassroots community organizer and spontaneous activist just by exploring your city. 

We don’t have all the answers and we can’t predict the future. But our movement is the only one that puts you in charge. Or just come along for the ride. We are doing this IndieGoGo (before the game is ready for public release) as a way of sparking the community that will shape and eventually OWN the technology. 

You decide what we do with our data, what we advocate for, and which corporations we exploit. But first we need to make a killer game. For that, we need you in it: adding ideas, gifs, memes, feedback, and investing a little bit of your hard-earned cash.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everyone can invest in something like this. STILL REACH OUT if you want to be a part of this new country. We're not trying to take your money - we’re trying to share power and make enough money to make it worth it for you to be involved.

Use the Indiegogo share tool, or share this link (igg.me/at/showupia). A new country is stronger with more citizens, so write an email or post to your followers about the new country they can help found. Like this one:

I'm helping build a new virtual country from scratch. It's called Showupia: an alternate-reality game to take advantage of the blurred line between real and virtual. People are in power and can capture politicians like Pokemon! 

I threw in $25 to the crowdfunding to help it become a reality, own a piece of it, and beta-test it for the coming public launch.

You should invest to! If you give a little more, you can be a character in the game:
https://igg.me/at/showupia

Hope you can join and help test this radically playful way to shake the system!

 

Also, as you can tell, we have no corporate overlords. If you want to collaborate politically, creatively, or technologically - please do! If you have any of these skills, hit us up and become an owner without giving a dime:

-Graphic Design

-Website dev

-PR and social media marketing

-Memes/content/bullshit

-App development

-Data scraping and database management

-Political lobbying experience

-Work on the Hill or at DC Council

Reach out to showup@showupia.com with the subject line “I got skills”.

Risks & Challenges

To be clear, this is something very weird and very new. We don’t have corporate funding or celebrities on board. And the political world doesn’t really understand “strategic comedy” until it already “works". If there were ever a time where something playful could “work", this is it. 

Safe, predictable, and perfectly manufactured campaign won’t really change the post-facts world.

Showupia is not perfect, but it's got heart. Our citizens are bigger fans of life than those grumpy old farts running the “real-world" show. This is the nation that says being you is a legitimate form of political expression. Dance and shout for power, instead of forcing it. 

There are no guarantees that this will change the world. But if the world’s gonna burn, we might as well have some fun playing the game of politics. And instead of telling you how to do it, we’re asking you how we should do it and inviting you in! The big challenges with advocating for something new are community buy-in and getting people to show up. The game makes it easy to do both.

Our Chief Sidekick Sam Bonar aka Filiblaster

Founder and Chief Sidekick Sam Bonar grew up in South Florida, with privilege, entitlement, and political relevance. For over 6 years now, he's loved calling DC home. But learning the history and culture of his new home taught him how it feels to be ignored, mistrusted, and be politically irrelevant (spoiler alert: it sucks).

He quit his job a year ago to use his background in comedy, government, and tech to create new power systems for people who are pissed. He got a Voqal Fellowship to help him get the first version of Showupia started. Now that initial development is finishing, he creating a community around the idea.

There’s so much bullshit in the world that we wish we could change, but people in DC get no say. And those who are “supposed" to represent poor and everyday people often don’t actually give a damn. They certainly don’t ask us what we think. Sam's work is about listening to outsiders, learning from and inspiring the forgotten, and embracing culture in the fight for freedom. He seeks to help others peel back the BS, unleash real people power, and proactively look to the future.

But our movement is the only one that puts you in charge. Or just come along for the ride. We are doing this IndieGoGo (before the game is ready for public release) as a way of sparking the community that will shape and eventually OWN the technology. You decide what we do with our data, what we advocate for, and which corporations we exploit. But first we need to make a killer game. For that, we need you in it: adding ideas, gifs, memes, feedback, and investing a little bit of your hard-earned cash.Other Ways You Can HelpWe know not everyone can invest in something like this. STILL REACH OUT if you want to be a part of this new country. We're not trying to take your money - we’re trying to share power and make enough money to make it worth it for you to be involved.Use the Indiegogo share tool, or share this link (igg.me/at/showupia). A new country is stronger with more citizens, so write an email or post to your followers about the new country they can help found. Like this one:I'm helping build a new virtual country from scratch. It's called Showupia: an alternate-reality game to take advantage of the blurred line between real and virtual. People are in power and can capture politicians like Pokemon! I threw in $25 to the crowdfunding to help it become a reality, own a piece of it, and beta-test it for the coming public launch.You should invest to! If you give a little more, you can be a character in the game:https://igg.me/at/showupiaHope you can join and help test this radically playful way to shake the system! Also, as you can tell, we have no corporate overlords. If you want to collaborate politically, creatively, or technologically - please do! If you have any of these skills, hit us up and become an owner without giving a dime:-Graphic Design-Website dev-PR and social media marketing-Memes/content/bullshit-App development-Data scraping and database management-Political lobbying experience-Work on the Hill or at DC CouncilReach out to showup@showupia.com with the subject line “I got skills”.Risks & ChallengesTo be clear, this is something very weird and very new. We don’t have corporate funding or celebrities on board. And the political world doesn’t really understand “strategic comedy” until it already “works". If there were ever a time where something playful could “work", this is it. Safe, predictable, and perfectly manufactured campaign won’t really change the post-facts world.Showupia is not perfect, but it's got heart. Our citizens are bigger fans of life than those grumpy old farts running the “real-world" show. This is the nation that says being you is a legitimate form of political expression. Dance and shout for power, instead of forcing it. There are no guarantees that this will change the world. But if the world’s gonna burn, we might as well have some fun playing the game of politics. And instead of telling you how to do it, we’re asking you how we should do it and inviting you in! The big challenges with advocating for something new are community buy-in and getting people to show up. The game makes it easy to do both.Our Chief Sidekick Sam Bonar aka FiliblasterFounder and Chief Sidekick Sam Bonar grew up in South Florida, with privilege, entitlement, and political relevance. For over 6 years now, he's loved calling DC home. But learning the history and culture of his new home taught him how it feels to be ignored, mistrusted, and be politically irrelevant (spoiler alert: it sucks).He quit his job a year ago to use his background in comedy, government, and tech to create new power systems for people who are pissed. He got a Voqal Fellowship to help him get the first version of Showupia started. Now that initial development is finishing, he creating a community around the idea.There’s so much bullshit in the world that we wish we could change, but people in DC get no say. And those who are “supposed" to represent poor and everyday people often don’t actually give a damn. They certainly don’t ask us what we think. Sam's work is about listening to outsiders, learning from and inspiring the forgotten, and embracing culture in the fight for freedom. He seeks to help others peel back the BS, unleash real people power, and proactively look to the future.

story:
Imagine being able to play the game on the best portable gaming system, from the comfort of your couch, bed, coffee bar,or anywhere.

Introducing PONY

The world's most powerful gaming laptop

Power by the next-gen console

Why

  • The next-gen console is designed to deliver the smoothest gaming experience and thousands of games, but you can only play in a particular place, no portability at all.
  • A High-Performance laptop offer a decent gaming experience with the portability. That’s a problem right there! It’s the price, It will take about $2300, and has a boring design.
  • So we build pony, the most powerful gaming laptop, inside is a game console ，provide tremendous power and lots of games. As a game console, you do not need to worry about hardware upgrades and the game is not smooth，all you need to do is play.

 

Key Features

  • Incredible 24" IPS Display
  • Amazing Sound System
  • Hardcore Next-gen Console Inside
  • High Performance Gaming Experience
  • Personal Entertainment Center
  • All-in-one Design
  • Prime Material
  • DIY Kit
  • Thousands of Games
  • Reasonable Price

Stretch Goals

As soon as Xbox Project Scorpio is released, we will develop the Project Scorpio version.From the official exposure of the structure of view, the basic can reuse the existing PONY structure, so the development will be very simple and controllable

Compatible

The PONY is compatible with nearly every next-gen console：

  • Xbox One （the original）
  • Xbox One S
  • PS4 （CHU1200 and later）
  • PS4 Slim

Incredible Display

  • The PONY 24" FHD IPS display is designed to deliver the smoothest gaming experience with 3ms response time, wide viewing angles, wide color coverage, reliable performance. 
  • PONY features HDMI output, support 4K/3D, which means you can output to a big screen TV or any monitor with HDMI.The display can run without console turn on, Connect your laptop or other HDMI device using the HDMI IN port, just like a PC monitor.
  • Support HDR

  • Plus a Blu-ray player, you can enjoy cinematic experience at anywhere!
  • You can watch some popular video on YouTube, or watch your favorite TV series through Netflix. Maybe you a movie lover, there is amazon LoveFilm app for you, and twitch for game live.

  • You can listen to online music through spotify,with PONY's four high-fidelity speakers, you will get an immersive music experience!

Amazing Sound System

The sound system delivers a full-range listening experience with big sound and deep bass. The sound system can run independently, it can be used as a Bluetooth stereo.

  • 25W class-d amplifier
  • Bluetooth support APT-X
  • Dual passive radiators
  • Dual subwoofers 
  • Dual full-range drivers
  • 3.5 mm auxiliary input 
  • 3.5 mm headphone jack 
 

Thousands of Games

  • AAA GAMES

  • KINECT GAMES (Kinect  is a line of motion sensing input devices)

  • Xbox 360 GAMES

  • PS4 GAMES
  • Play PS3 games on PS4

​

Gaming Demo

  • Sunset Overdrive
  • Forza Horizon 3
 

 

Reasonable Price

Reliable Cooling System

1. The cooling system provides perfect and absolutely quiet operation, which is the original console cooling system efficiency of 3 times, and the power supply has an exclusive PWM fan.

2. The cooling system is rated with 210W TDP (Thermal Dissipation Power) thanks to its 4 copper heat pipes, dual large copper heat fins, one power supply fan, and dual 120mm PWM fans.

3. The cooling system is specifically designed to help keep your console running cool after long hours of play. No overheating !   No blue light of  death !   No Loud noise !

Customizable Nameplate

Your name will be engraved on the nameplate and will have a unique code

Multiple color options

As you expect, we offer a variety of color options, each color has been carefully designed, with the campaign, we will release more colors, so keep a concern. At the end of the campaign, our staff will contact you and confirm the color you want.

Extremely strong

We used ultra-light aluminum roll cage to protect internal components, such as the 24" LED screen and motherboard etc.

Features

PONY DIY Kit

We also introduce the PONY DIY KIT.It takes only three steps to turn your own game console into a laptop!

  1. Put your own console motherboard into the kit,
  2. Plug some connectors,hook up some screws.
  3. Turn on power ,you are good to go!

Just like building a PC without installing the operating system. That was easy!!!

Oh, I forgot the last step: Make sure your friends are present to witness this miracle

Built-in power supply

  • It has sufficient power to support the console ,the sound system  and the display
  • The power supply has an exclusive PWM fan,which mean reliable  and quiet.
  • Supports multiple input voltages：AC 110-240v
  • One powe cable!

We will be according to different countries and regions ship the corresponding standard plug

  • The Original Xbox with Ugly Power Supply

 

Lossless modification

  • Full Function,all interfaces on the console are reserved.
  • Installation tool requires only a screwdriver and a thermally conductive paste

PONY Travel Bag

  • Fits a PONY plus 15.4" laptop and accessories
  • Waterproof
  • Removable protection panel
  • Horizontal and vertical carrying handles

Retractable & Adjustable Shoulder Strap 

 why 24 inch？

  • The video is a crucial part of the way we experience content . The Visual Acuity Distance [1]  is 0.96 m (3.2 ft) which means you got a lot of image detail .
  • The best viewing distance for 24 " FHD display is : 1.47 ft ~ 3.6 ft ( 45cm~110cm )，just match the Visual Acuity Distance.

Notes:

[1] The Ideal Viewing Distance based on Visual Acuity. This distance is calculated based on the reference resolving power of the eyes. The human eye with 20/20 vision can detect or resolve details as small as 1/60th of a degree of arc. This distance represents the point beyond which some details in the picture are no longer able to be resolved, so pixels begin to blend together. Closer to the screen than this may result in the need for higher resolution display. This value should be lowered if visual acuity is worst then 20/20, raised if visual acuity is better.

 why resolution is 1920×1080 ?

  • Because the console games are run Native Resolutions and Framerates under 1080p and 60FPS，the 24" 1080p(FHD) screen DPI is the  best DPI for console games. 

Native Resolutions and Framerates List:


Learn more from the IGN: http://www.ign.com/wikis/xbox-one/PS4_vs._Xbox_One_Native_Resolutions_and_Framerates

The Development

PONY started in a home living room in February 2016. Since that time, we’ve spent the last year developing over 9 generations of prototypes and countless performance tests in order to bring the amazing game experience.

Tech specs

Display

  • Diagonal: 24 inches
  • Resolution: 1920 x 1080
  • Frequency：60 Hz
  • Response Time：3ms
  • Viewing angle: 178horzin \178vertical
  • HDMI IN: 1080P 60Hz, HDR
  • HDMI OUT: 1080P 60Hz  4K \3D
  • Width: 20.9" (53.1 cm)
  • Height: 11.8" (29.9 cm)
  • Aspect Ratio: 1.78:1 (16:9)

Sound system

  • 25W class-d amplifier
  • Bluetooth support APT-X
  • Dual passive radiators
  • Dual subwoofers
  • Dual full-range drivers
  • 3.5 mm auxiliary input
  • 3.5 mm headphone jack

Dimension

  • Width: 541mm
  • Height: 330mm
  • Depth: 60mm

Weight(not include the console)

  • 2.95kg(6.5lb)

Power Input

  • AC 110-240V

 

Roadmap to Delivery

Shipping

  • Where We Ship?

We are able to ship worldwide.Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their PONY from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.  If you change your address between now and when we ship, Please contact : contact@surfrider-tech.com

  • When We Start Shipping?

Orders placed now will begin shipping in August 2017.(*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.)

story: Game
story_txt: Game

story:
Short Summary

XMobs is a social street game leveraging location awareness and interactivity between mobile devices to deliver a fun experience for people anywhere on the globe.

Xmobs is a treasure hunt game where groups of friends can socialize, compete and have a good time. Xmobs is designed to deliver a rich experience, providing a shareable social experience where friends can explore their surroundings, be it the best bars and restaurants nearby or points of interest from cultural or historical points of view.

Oren Simon, Executive Manager: “I used the Xmobs Beta version with my children and their friends, and had an experience we will all keep in our hearts for a long long time. We are now offering our free Beta to  the public.”


We have started this campaign to help us raise the funds we need to further develop the game and to assist us in distributing it to as many people as we can reach. We would also appreciate any and all feedback you have on ideas for new features, improvements, your experience using it, and regarding any bugs you come across.

Xmobs is developed by the LapsiNotes group (visit us on facebook to learn more) - a team of creative experienced entrepreneurs from all over the globe, collaborating over the Internet to develop mobile social applications.

What We Need & What You Get

We hope to raise 50,000 Euro, which will enable us to develop and add new features and game modes as well as improve the user experience.

With these funds we plan to develop and distribute two versions of XMobs: a free version, and a Pro version. The Pro version, which will work on an annual subscription basis, will unlock additional features, allow more of your friends to play a game, and more.

By becoming an early supporter, you'll get access to the Pro version with great savings. Contribute enough, and you'll get a lifetime subscription (see the perks section for more details).

The Impact

XMobs is more than just a game - it impacts how people socialise and interact when they are out and about in the real world. You can easily create your own treasure-hunt games, which might be a bar-crawl for you and your friends to make a more interesting night out, or it might be a tour of the local area so that people can find new places, or learn about the history. The list is endless.

We’re partnering with NexiiLabs, application development and cloud specialists with an entire R&D team at the fingertips.

XMobs is not only for entertainment. There is huge potential for vendors and organizations to use it as a promotional tool to drive patrons to their stores or events. It could also serve as an educational tool, in the form of tour guides of historical sites and attractions. Once users begin to understand the potential, countless more applications will arise.

This technology has the potential to own the intersection of the virtual and the real world.

Risks & Challenges

Software  development can be a tricky process - there may be unforeseen challenges and  unexpected delays. Fortunately, our management team is very experienced with years of hands-on management of software products development.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's not just funds we're looking for - we crave feedback and suggestions. We want to make XMobs the best it can be. Our free beta version is already on Google Play, and we'd love to see even more people using it, and letting us know what they think. You can be a huge part of our development process, helping shape the next generations of the game.

  • Please download and play the game with your  friends and tell us what you think (from things you think we should improve to things you think we should include)

  • Please share your experience, the the availability of the game and our campaigning efforts with your network -  we depend on you to distribute us as far as possible

story:
Hello We are Mero Studios, A team comprised by people concerned about education and culture, besides we are video game fans.

A lot of people continues to believe that video games and culture are enemies, and that culture and the education can't be entertaining, a lot of people continues to believe that a videogame do not contribute with social growth at all.

We believe, and are sure that videogames could get be a powerful tool for cultural diffusion and they can build bridges which helps us to get closer as human beings.

Committed with our dreams and our cultural roots, we are developing a game named Chac mool Xec.

Now, Lets start with the basics:

Chac Mool: It´s a mayan word , and is used to name a kind of representative statues located in the mesoamerican region, and representative of the mayan culture.

Xec: It´s a peculiar mayan word which is used to denominate a fruit salad, although, used in popular terms “Xec” means Mix.

Chacmool Xec can be translated as “Chac mool Salad” or “Chacmool Mix Up”, and with that name you can imagine what the game is about.

“Chacmool Xec: A fun story with cultural Content”

In this Adventure the Mischief Alux Niich (A kind of sprite), bored and without jokes to make to the human people, decided to have fun with the chac mooles, and… ¡he has broke them all! The good Tatich, is a responsible alux, and warned of the importance of the chac mooles is determined to fix the damage made by his mischievous friend. But Niich will not make things easy for Tatich. Your Mission: “Help Tatich in this adventure, fixing and meeting the funny chac mooles.



Tatich (Alux):

Niich (Alux):


Chac-moles:

 > Xoxotic


 > Makataka


> Olin







We live in a in region rich in history, culture and legends,  and we noticed how day by day a part of this culture has been lost of sight or just has been lagged against the technologies, and urban growth of our city. The people just lost and still losing the contact with their roots and for this reason, our game is trying to achieve, not just the people get awareness and disseminates the mayan culture, but in a funny way, teach a part of how wonderful the history of Mesoamerica is. Our game not simply entertains, but, promotes and disseminate the Mexican Culture Values.




We know, that participate in this movements of cultural diffusion is not an easy work, to gather and present the historical data could be exhausting. We are aware of the work we have in front  is kinda titanic, and we count on our committed team willing to spend nights without sleep just to achieve our objective and share our idea with the world.  



Wanna be a part of this project but are low of funds?, ¡Be a part of Mero Studios, Digital Media Campaign and help us to spread our message and this indiegogo campaign around the world.


Niich, Tatich, Chac mooles and Mero Studios will thank to you!

In this Adventure the Mischief Alux Niich (A kind of sprite), bored and without jokes to make to the human people, decided to have fun with the chac mooles, and… ¡he has broke them all! The good Tatich, is a responsible alux, and warned of the importance of the chac mooles is determined to fix the damage made by his mischievous friend. But Niich will not make things easy for Tatich. Your Mission: “Help Tatich in this adventure, fixing and meeting the funny chac mooles. 







Tatich (Alux):


Niich (Alux):



Chac-moles: > Xoxotic


 > Makataka



> Olin











We live in a in region rich in history, culture and legends,  and we noticed how day by day a part of this culture has been lost of sight or just has been lagged against the technologies, and urban growth of our city. The people just lost and still losing the contact with their roots and for this reason, our game is trying to achieve, not just the people get awareness and disseminates the mayan culture, but in a funny way, teach a part of how wonderful the history of Mesoamerica is. Our game not simply entertains, but, promotes and disseminate the Mexican Culture Values. 




We know, that participate in this movements of cultural diffusion is not an easy work, to gather and present the historical data could be exhausting. We are aware of the work we have in front  is kinda titanic, and we count on our committed team willing to spend nights without sleep just to achieve our objective and share our idea with the world.  




Wanna be a part of this project but are low of funds?, ¡Be a part of Mero Studios, Digital Media Campaign and help us to spread our message and this indiegogo campaign around the world.
Niich, Tatich, Chac mooles and Mero Studios will thank to you!

story:
Pour voir le PITCH EN FRANÇAIS, cliquez-ici.

Each player, together in the same place, will use "his" smartphone or tablet(1) and a local wireless network(2) to challenge, question other players and solve the case.

(1): smartphone or tablet are strictly used to manage the game elements: objects, money, clues, mini games, etc.
(2): with a box wifi network or a mobile ad hoc network.

We will present you Jonathan on bottom of this page, a boy who has just discovered our concept at the International Festival of Games in Cannes (France). This is a game all age 7 to 77 and between 4 to 15 players! He will speak about it… And as it is a player, he has left you some clues to try to win an unusual day with the designers of the game.

Your mission, should you accept it, will be to help us to give birth to THE first SOCIAL and DIGITAL BOARD GAME in THE WORLD: the REPLAY PARTY

This is a NEW type of social and fun game: a new generation board game that is played in groups, each with their smartphone or tablet, LAN. This is a set of challenges and survey-based on thematic stories (between 30 min and 2 h the game).

The 4 key points of our social game:

  •   Have fun in a group with your phone or tablet

  •   Challenge your friends through hilarious mini-games

  •   Play as a character and discover the guilty one
  •   Throw a party in few minutes without preparation


With their smartphone or tablet, each player will accomplish the goals, challenges, and of course solve the main plot by interacting with other players. The application REPLAY PARTY will be available free on Windows Mobile, iOS and Android. It regularly offer thematic scenarios free or not to download. But it will also allow you to create your own script with the evidence provided (characters, signs, objects, places, goals, mini-games ...) or simply with yours, and why not touch copyrights if your story pleasing to the gaming community!


Want to know more? Who are we? Why and how we run the application? What is the game about? What does it look like? How does it work? What is the project? Why do they need money? So many questions ...

During the participatory campaign, we want to hear your opinions and support whether financial or not: it is essential for this application that is built for players.

Feel free to talk about the project around you, and share it with your friends on social networks. If you have knowledge, such as journalists, have them take a look at our concept of digital game, it would help us a lot!


"How do I play?"


"Hi Jonathan! The application for your phone or tablet is not ready yet."

"Really? Why?"


"To make a good game, you have to listen to player feedback and take the time to develop the game. We have to appeal to programmers, integrators, illustrators, etc ..."

"Why? You can not do it yourself?"


"We are specialists in survey games in France since 2009. We organize role plays for groups of friends or companies, 400 events in 5 years! We have written more than 8 scenarios."

"Who is that « us »?"


"My name is Olivier Le Borgne. I have an engineering background and from my experience, I have worked in all areas of business management, event management, communication, computer graphics and development. Last year, Elodie Atlan, a multi-faceted artist joined me to write surveys, and most recently Cedric LONGCHAMP for computer graphics, among others! We also worked with Sandra MARTINEAU is author of detective novels. You can find out more in my interview on Canal Jimmy by Ariane Massenet. I speak of Murder Party, but REPLAY PARTY implementation will not be limited only to police investigations ... Flights, Lock, Disappearances but Quests, Magic, Team Building, Practicing languages, Love etc ..." 



"And can I help you?"


"Of course, by giving us your opinion on graphical models that we realized for example. You can also follow the game design, support us and the project by talking to your friends, and especially by choosing a counterpart etc ..."

"What will you do with the money raised?"


"Lots of things! As a priority, we will work with developers to make the programming interface and mini-games, and then with an ergonomist so that the application is as practical as possible, and of course with an illustrator to create the characters, the sets and the final objects to integrate them in the scenarios. "



"That's so cool! And if you collect more money than expected?"


"It's a very good question So here it would be top call will be employed translators to transcribe the scenarios in several languages ​​We will write new scenarios, we will develop a lot of other mini-games!.. Puzzles, challenges, wages, in a spirit of social play between players! "

"I think I get it. What will be the goal of the game exactly?"


"The goal is always the same: find the guilty one: theft, a crime, a mistake, a scam ... solve puzzles with the help of other players, depending on the scenario chosen, and it will depend. for this, yo’ll have to find clues, trade items, negotiate information and challenge other players. "

"Wow, can I see what that looks like?"


"Of course. This is the main screen when you begun some after selecting your character. We have 30 other models currently we can show you and explain." 


"Great! I'll talk to my friends, I am looking forward to play."


"Do not hesitate to ask us about the progression of the apps and especially if you want to  help us."

"I have a call. We'll talk about it very soon !!"

story:
My Story

Hi. I'm a 19 year old student from Zagreb, Croatia, pursuing a bachelor's degree in engineering and computer sciences.  Since I was a little kid I was playing video games and some of the best memories of my life were made while playing games with my best friends. Since games mattered so much to us and made us bond like few other things could, I decided that, just like the people who made those games and made them mean everything to us, I wanted to create something that, hopefully, a group of freinds plays and enjoys together just like we did. So far I've made a bunch of games for PC, android and iOS, some even published on the App Store and Google Play Store, but now I would love to publish my first game on Steam using it's Greenlight program.


About the game

In "During The Search" you play as a guy who is looking for his best friend in the middle of a zombie outbreak. While he's searching for her, he has to evade zombies, help injured people and wonder around in the dark with just a flashlight. In the end, he finds her, but it's too late, she gets infected right infront of his eyes. He decides that life is just to cruel and gives up on everything...almost...


What I need

In order to reach my goal I need to pay a 100$ submission fee to get my game onto Steam's Greenlight program. Since the minimum amount a campaign can be started with is 500$, whatever money i have left I will use to buy additional assets and donate some of it to other developers that need to pay the same sum


Your Donations

Any donations i recieve are very welcome and I will be endlessly grateful, regardless of the amount. I encourage you to take a look at the Facebook page to see what the game looks like so far and how it is making progress and only donate if you believe it's worth it. I've gotten plenty of support of the Indie Game Developers Facebook group which gave me confidence to start this fundraiser in the first place so I'm fairly certain that you will like what you'll see.

To anyone who donates 5$ or more I will give a Steam key for the game.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate but want to help me out you could always share this on social media and like my Facebook page. ANY help is appreciated and welcome.


Preview of the main menu (likely not final, more options might be added)

Level 1 (tutorial level) - Work in progress (missing voice acting and tooltips)

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for your time, I hope it was worth it :)

story:
"Pomenia Fairy Dress Up" is the first whimsical and wacky mobile game to be published from the Fairy Dreamland of Pomenia. The game launches the series of 8 episode based mobile games.

In the topsy-turvy and funtastic ”Fairy Dress up” game a CHILD decides what their fairy would wear if they could choose an outfit – and why couldn’t they choose their clothes freely, on their great adventure to collect Magic Fairy Dust?

In Pomenia just like in the human world choosing for yourself is the funnest thing of all. Dressed up in a cape instantly makes you more courageous! Choosing an extra sparkly outfit twirls the whole room into a magical dreamland and suddenly anything is possible. Do you remember courage and expression without any limitations, expectations, or set rules? There was no end to that fun! (Especially if an unwilling little sister or brother was dragged along).

There are surprises after another in the game, because there is nothing ordinary in getting dressed up in Pomenia. Fairies, children, and other magical creatures are always a bit tricky to dress. Have a look for yourself! Preparations could best be described as wacky, giggly, goofy, dragony, princessy, stunning and tickly, trollfull and exceptionally bunny.

 

 

 

 

It is time to collect fairy dust, for a GREAT adventure awaits! The one who is to save all of Pomenia is already on the way and before the grand arrival the fairies need to get dressed in magical, wonderful outfits. There are always some difficulties when dealing with magical creatures and so this task is not quite as simple as you might think. The fairies see each day as the birthday of a new day and that means every one of them wants to choose their own perfect outfit. The only way to know which outfit best is to test them in action. The right combination will be great to fly in and feel just right.

Time does not exist in Pomenia, there is just magic. Creativity and will are the very best characteristic of all magical creatures: fairies, children, and the rest. We should do all we can to preserve that. So, let’s help the fairies get dressed up and find what makes them feel uniquely themselves. Adventures await!

Without further ado, fairytale folk and everyone gathered around! Please let us introduce the seven fairies of Pomenia! Or perhaps eight, or nine if you count carefully. Here are the sassy and spicy, colourful, and characterful fairies: Scarlet Sunrise, Dahlia Daydreamer, Shamrock Shady, Marigold Merry, Fuchsia Fantastic, Lilac Lovely, Saphron Sparkle and Sinopia Surly! 

You may have noticed that Shamrock is still hiding? Shamrock is called Shady for a reason and prefers the magic of sunshine spotted through a canopy of leaves than a bright spotlight. But Shady Shamrock loves dress-up games just as much as his fairy sisters do. I have an idea! Let’s all whisper that it is perfectly fine for Shamrock to join the fun. Dressing up in all the colours of the rainbow, crowns and boots, wands and waggly tails is allowed for all adventurers and being silly is the best part of any day!

PS. Shamrock is amazing, by the way. He loves everything green and especially if it has dash and shine to it.

 

 

 

 

 

  • Animated fairytale at the start of the Games tells you why collecting Magic Fairy Dust is more important than ever before
  • Hundreds of magical outfits, silly hats, accessories, shoes, hairdos...
  • ...and costumes with everything from troll tails to bunny ears and ALL designed by fairytailor Petronella.
  • Customize the outfits with your own design!
  • Take a photo of the dressed-up fairy
     
  • Get to know all the magical fairies of Pomenia
  • No rules, and no pressure with time limits. Be as silly as you want!
  • Child-friendly, easy to use functionalities with an imaginative fairytale storybook feel
  • No sharing option for privacy & security reasons
  • No outside advertisements or in-app purchases
     
  • Sing along with the fairy and the troll to the theme song of Pomenia  
  • Create your own background images with the camera function
  • Loads of wonderful puzzles
  • Fairy Gallery

Fairy dust, fairy dust, and more fairy dust!

Supported OS's: Apple iOS: 10 & 11
Android: 5.0 & 5.1 Lollipop, 6.0 Marshmallow, 7.0 Nougat, 8.0 & 8.1 Oreo

 

 

 

 

In Pomenia, the adventures of trolls and dragons, unicorns and fairies take you to a place that you have only dreamed about, perhaps a long time ago.

Pomenia is the exciting story of a unique little boy who is swept away by magic. One morning, the little boy wakes up in his bed in the middle of fairy dreamland Pomenia, and he has been transformed into a cute little troll. Soon audacious adventures await him, together with a kind dragon who fears flying! The duo must save Pomenia from eternal winter and coldness, which Spite McGnarly loves and cherishes. Magic fairy dust is urgently needed – a lot of magic dairy dust. Luckily, they do not need to survive alone in any of their daunting endeavors, because in Pomenia all creatures – great and small, from beetles to fairies – help each other, always. In Pomenia good and evil battle, yet no evil is so great that a small child would have difficulty facing it.  Conquering fear, using courage and collaboration help to achieve new surprising skills. 

The dramatically exciting story teaches that the most important thing we learn is the courage to be true to yourself. Be yourself, no matter who you are: whether you are Spite McGnarly, a dragon who fears flying, a fairy who loves beauty and goodness, or even a small, frizzly-haired troll.

The challenges the characters of the story confront are the same that children face every day, everywhere in the world. Finding one's inner strengths, respecting the differences of others and working together are all essential – regardless of your age, gender, or background.

Pomenia speaks of kindness, adventure, courage, joy, and magic. Themes which affect people around the world. Themes we value and treasure. Themes which affect people around the world.

 

 

 

“We will do something”, Lily Dragon promised. “Let’s ask for help. Monsieur Mouse and Lily were all set to go. Mouse placed his tiny paws ceremoniously against Lily Dragon’s grand paws and together they yelled as loud as they could: “one, two, three HELP!!!!”

This campaign is vital to us. By supporting our work, you will enable the mobile game adventures to be finalised and the story animated with graphics, voice actors, and music.

We are adding exclusive and unique features to the fairytale adventure game to engage adventurers of all ages. 

We have calculated the production costs for the mobile game and believe them to be highly accurate.

A successfully funded campaign will save the world of Pomenia and open the doors to an unseen fairy dreamland!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If our campaign is supported over our expectations we will use the additional funding for a Pomenia storybook, both in English and in Finnish. The storybook has been distributed for feedback within the Pomenia community and the response has been encouraging.

”Our kids jumped into the world of Pomenia right from the first page. The story is captivating, carrying you through Posy Meadow to wild adventures. There are many wonderful characters and the scenes are very lively.

As a parent, I think the best thing about the story is that it shows both sides of characters. Nobody is completely evil, everyone has their own story and perspective. And I loved how our children adopted the characters into their own imaginative play. They like the fairy Sinopia Surly and the wicked warlock Spite McGnarly the most.

At bedtime, we often talk about why certain things happen. Reading the story and talking about the events has been an enriching experience for us, brought me closer to my kids.”

Jukka, father of seven-year-old and eight-year-old.

 

 

 

 

The risks involved in creating the mobile game have to do with managing resources, such as the available funds and working closely with the coding and graphic design team so that the project is completed on time and on budget.

We have been running an online business offering children's products for over a decade and we have a good network of reliable partners with whom we have been working with for many years already.



Finland has an exceptional level of expertise in creating mobile games. After careful selection, we are outsourcing the technical game development to Finnish Kyy Games Ltd, who is an award-winning and trusted partner.

 

 

 

Pomenia is the creation of fairytale artist, founder of children’s clothing brand Tinttu.com and long-time entrepreneur Petronella Grahn. Petronella emphasises the meaning of stories and imagination in a child’s life and development. She is an advocate for a child’s right to be childishly playful and creative.

She first introduced her fairytale world to the public through the Tinttu.com children’s fashion collection and kept the stories of Pomenia to herself, for over twenty years. Petronella has shared the tales of the Fairy Dreamland with her six children as wonderful bedtime stories, teaching them important lessons and creating magical games.

Petronella wanted to bring forth the fairytale world that all her creativity was based on, but she was waiting for courage to take that leap of faith and the time never seemed right to share the stories until in 2015 when she met co-founder Stephanie Sinclair Lappi. 

Petronella and Stephanie shared the same values of upbringing children in a colourful world of play, imagination, dreaming, and stories. When they started to plan a partnership, they noticed they also shared a strong work ethic, believing in what they could create with the ability to see wonderfully big things happen and by constantly teaching themselves new things.

Pomenia is a unique company in the mobile app/game space, with management consisting of two strong Scandinavian women. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


"If you want your child to see a dragon, tell your child about dragons. Tell about the velvety scales, how they move as the dragon breathes in and out-and the child takes an easy breath in and out"

Petronella Grahn imagined the Fairy Dreamland of Pomenia for her own six children. She creates all the enchanting fairytale art and stories of Pomenia and is in charge of the vision and direction of Pomenia. Petronella oversees the mobile game creation and animation. She is a fairytailor and an interior designer, creating the products for Pomenia Design by Fairytale Artist Petronella with over twenty years of experience in merchandising and online commerce. As the founder and long-time successful entrepreneur of children’s clothing and interior design company Tinttu.com Petronella Grahn has the skills and experience to create exceptional ventures.  

Stephanie Sinclair Lappi manages the international networks, negotiations, and operations of Pomenia. She speaks fluent Finnish, Fairy and English and is busy turning the fairy dreamland of Pomenia into enchanted English. Stephanie Sinclair Lappi took her first three-person company from Finland to the New York Nasdaq stock exchange and is looking forward to building Pomenia together with Petronella Grahn. In Pomenia Stephanie Sinclair Lappi is in charge of magical operations and escapades. She is a map maker, a courageous adventurer and director of good news.


 

Pomenia wants to tell stories through various channels. Children and families need to be approached where children are in 2018 and this means bringing the fairytale world to virtual formats such as mobile apps, and downloadable music. We are not forgetting traditional channels but offering mobile apps alongside board games and animated stories and video books alongside traditional storybooks. Our guiding principle is to bring options to the international children’s market that are carefully thought out, with a strong value base and child-sensitive content without compromising imagination, adventure, and creativity.

It was natural that the first of eight apps to be published from Pomenia was the Fairy Dress Up app. Petronella Grahn is the creator and designer behind all the magical clothing and fairytale forest hats in her own children’s clothing brand Tinttu.com. One big, wonderful dress-up game for all children! Bunnies and foxes, dragons, and fairies… Every child has the right to be the creative, playful, and imaginative being that they truly are. This has been the life mission of Petronella. Those childhood dressing up apps were the very beginning of Tinttu.com and of this mobile app.

The world of Pomenia is intended to be shared, as all magical things are. Petronella Grahn has said “Welcome” to everything Pomenia brings as that is what anyone entering Pomenia hears on their arrival. 

”Give a child the gift of imagination and enthusiasm, to soar through life”

-Petronella

Shamrock is called Shady for a reason and prefers the magic of sunshine spotted through a canopy of leaves than a bright spotlight.
