Dressing up in all the colours of the rainbow, crowns and boots, wands and waggly tails is allowed for all adventurers and being silly is the best part of any day!PS. Shamrock is amazing, by the way. He loves everything green and especially if it has dash and shine to it.     
Animated fairytale at the start of the Games tells you why collecting Magic Fairy Dust is more important than ever before
Hundreds of magical outfits, silly hats, accessories, shoes, hairdos...
...and costumes with everything from troll tails to bunny ears and ALL designed by fairytailor Petronella.
Customize the outfits with your own design!
Take a photo of the dressed-up fairy 
Get to know all the magical fairies of Pomenia
No rules, and no pressure with time limits. Be as silly as you want!
Child-friendly, easy to use functionalities with an imaginative fairytale storybook feel
No sharing option for privacy & security reasons
No outside advertisements or in-app purchases 
Sing along with the fairy and the troll to the theme song of Pomenia  
Create your own background images with the camera function
Loads of wonderful puzzles
Fairy Gallery
Fairy dust, fairy dust, and more fairy dust!Supported OS's: Apple iOS: 10 & 11Android: 5.0 & 5.1 Lollipop, 6.0 Marshmallow, 7.0 Nougat, 8.0 & 8.1 Oreo    In Pomenia, the adventures of trolls and dragons, unicorns and fairies take you to a place that you have only dreamed about, perhaps a long time ago.Pomenia is the exciting story of a unique little boy who is swept away by magic. One morning, the little boy wakes up in his bed in the middle of fairy dreamland Pomenia, and he has been transformed into a cute little troll. Soon audacious adventures await him, together with a kind dragon who fears flying! The duo must save Pomenia from eternal winter and coldness, which Spite McGnarly loves and cherishes. Magic fairy dust is urgently needed – a lot of magic dairy dust. Luckily, they do not need to survive alone in any of their daunting endeavors, because in Pomenia all creatures – great and small, from beetles to fairies – help each other, always. In Pomenia good and evil battle, yet no evil is so great that a small child would have difficulty facing it.  Conquering fear, using courage and collaboration help to achieve new surprising skills. The dramatically exciting story teaches that the most important thing we learn is the courage to be true to yourself. Be yourself, no matter who you are: whether you are Spite McGnarly, a dragon who fears flying, a fairy who loves beauty and goodness, or even a small, frizzly-haired troll.The challenges the characters of the story confront are the same that children face every day, everywhere in the world. Finding one's inner strengths, respecting the differences of others and working together are all essential – regardless of your age, gender, or background.Pomenia speaks of kindness, adventure, courage, joy, and magic. Themes which affect people around the world. Themes we value and treasure. Themes which affect people around the world.   “We will do something”, Lily Dragon promised. “Let’s ask for help. Monsieur Mouse and Lily were all set to go. Mouse placed his tiny paws ceremoniously against Lily Dragon’s grand paws and together they yelled as loud as they could: “one, two, three HELP!!!!”This campaign is vital to us. By supporting our work, you will enable the mobile game adventures to be finalised and the story animated with graphics, voice actors, and music.We are adding exclusive and unique features to the fairytale adventure game to engage adventurers of all ages. We have calculated the production costs for the mobile game and believe them to be highly accurate.A successfully funded campaign will save the world of Pomenia and open the doors to an unseen fairy dreamland!         If our campaign is supported over our expectations we will use the additional funding for a Pomenia storybook, both in English and in Finnish. The storybook has been distributed for feedback within the Pomenia community and the response has been encouraging.”Our kids jumped into the world of Pomenia right from the first page. The story is captivating, carrying you through Posy Meadow to wild adventures. There are many wonderful characters and the scenes are very lively.As a parent, I think the best thing about the story is that it shows both sides of characters. Nobody is completely evil, everyone has their own story and perspective. And I loved how our children adopted the characters into their own imaginative play. They like the fairy Sinopia Surly and the wicked warlock Spite McGnarly the most.At bedtime, we often talk about why certain things happen. Reading the story and talking about the events has been an enriching experience for us, brought me closer to my kids.”Jukka, father of seven-year-old and eight-year-old.   

 
The risks involved in creating the mobile game have to do with managing resources, such as the available funds and working closely with the coding and graphic design team so that the project is completed on time and on budget.
We have been running an online business offering children's products for over a decade and we have a good network of reliable partners with whom we have been working with for many years already.Finland has an exceptional level of expertise in creating mobile games. After careful selection, we are outsourcing the technical game development to Finnish Kyy Games Ltd, who is an award-winning and trusted partner.
 
 
 


Pomenia is the creation of fairytale artist, founder of children’s clothing brand Tinttu.com and long-time entrepreneur Petronella Grahn. Petronella emphasises the meaning of stories and imagination in a child’s life and development. She is an advocate for a child’s right to be childishly playful and creative.
She first introduced her fairytale world to the public through the Tinttu.com children’s fashion collection and kept the stories of Pomenia to herself, for over twenty years. Petronella has shared the tales of the Fairy Dreamland with her six children as wonderful bedtime stories, teaching them important lessons and creating magical games.Petronella wanted to bring forth the fairytale world that all her creativity was based on, but she was waiting for courage to take that leap of faith and the time never seemed right to share the stories until in 2015 when she met co-founder Stephanie Sinclair Lappi. Petronella and Stephanie shared the same values of upbringing children in a colourful world of play, imagination, dreaming, and stories. When they started to plan a partnership, they noticed they also shared a strong work ethic, believing in what they could create with the ability to see wonderfully big things happen and by constantly teaching themselves new things.Pomenia is a unique company in the mobile app/game space, with management consisting of two strong Scandinavian women.        "If you want your child to see a dragon, tell your child about dragons. Tell about the velvety scales, how they move as the dragon breathes in and out-and the child takes an easy breath in and out"Petronella Grahn imagined the Fairy Dreamland of Pomenia for her own six children. She creates all the enchanting fairytale art and stories of Pomenia and is in charge of the vision and direction of Pomenia. Petronella oversees the mobile game creation and animation. She is a fairytailor and an interior designer, creating the products for Pomenia Design by Fairytale Artist Petronella with over twenty years of experience in merchandising and online commerce. As the founder and long-time successful entrepreneur of children’s clothing and interior design company Tinttu.com Petronella Grahn has the skills and experience to create exceptional ventures.  Stephanie Sinclair Lappi manages the international networks, negotiations, and operations of Pomenia. She speaks fluent Finnish, Fairy and English and is busy turning the fairy dreamland of Pomenia into enchanted English. Stephanie Sinclair Lappi took her first three-person company from Finland to the New York Nasdaq stock exchange and is looking forward to building Pomenia together with Petronella Grahn. In Pomenia Stephanie Sinclair Lappi is in charge of magical operations and escapades. She is a map maker, a courageous adventurer and director of good news. Pomenia wants to tell stories through various channels. Children and families need to be approached where children are in 2018 and this means bringing the fairytale world to virtual formats such as mobile apps, and downloadable music. We are not forgetting traditional channels but offering mobile apps alongside board games and animated stories and video books alongside traditional storybooks. Our guiding principle is to bring options to the international children’s market that are carefully thought out, with a strong value base and child-sensitive content without compromising imagination, adventure, and creativity.It was natural that the first of eight apps to be published from Pomenia was the Fairy Dress Up app. Petronella Grahn is the creator and designer behind all the magical clothing and fairytale forest hats in her own children’s clothing brand Tinttu.com. One big, wonderful dress-up game for all children! Bunnies and foxes, dragons, and fairies… Every child has the right to be the creative, playful, and imaginative being that they truly are. This has been the life mission of Petronella. Those childhood dressing up apps were the very beginning of Tinttu.com and of this mobile app.The world of Pomenia is intended to be shared, as all magical things are. Petronella Grahn has said “Welcome” to everything Pomenia brings as that is what anyone entering Pomenia hears on their arrival. ”Give a child the gift of imagination and enthusiasm, to soar through life”-Petronella

story:
NHS Survival: Calling for a Royal Commission for the NHS


Please help fund our campaign. We're calling for an independent ‘Royal Commission’ for the NHS. An NHS fit for Patients, Public and Professionals. 


It's time for patients, public and professionals to write the future together.

The Commission would be made up of academics, patient groups, healthcare professionals, Royal Colleges and representatives from all major parties (with all members being free of competing interests).

This would transform our NHS but in a more sustainable way - ensuring it is kept available for all.

It would use evidence-based research to make key recommendations for the long-term and for much longer than just five year cycles. We will push all the main political parties to commit to its conclusions. It would also consider social care.

Please donate - whether it’s £1 or £5. Every little bit helps.


What’s a Royal Commission?

A Royal Commission is a select group of people appointed by the Government to investigate a matter of important public concern and to make recommendations on any actions to be taken. It has been used to tackle areas of controversy that are politically difficult, so hard decisions can be taken in the sake of the national good.

For example, the 1991 Royal Commission on Criminal Justice heard from over 600 groups and individuals, commissioned 22 pieces of research - and led to the 1995 Criminal Appeal Act and the creation of the Criminal Cases Review Commission.

A Royal Commission can make objective, non-political recommendations which will be the starting point of a new partnership between patients, public and professionals to work with politicians and form an NHS for the future.

The goalposts can’t keep moving every 5 years!

We have to take a new and more open approach.

Once a Commission reports, the onus is then on the Government of the day to explain fully why they wouldn’t choose to participate in this process, why they would deviate from any recommendations, and on NHS staff and respective unions to do the same.

This would transform our NHS but in a more sustainable way - ensuring it is kept available for all.


What will my donation do?

We want your help to fund advertisements to get our message out.

We would consider where and when to advertise to maximise our campaign goals - but most likely, we would need to advertise our call for a Royal Commission via newspaper and online ads.

We will also use the funds for preparing campaign packs and/or other materials to distribute as needed to local groups. Additionally, there are other needs that arise, such as IT costs, marketing and branding.

We would like to thank those who supported our previous IndieGoGo campaigns. We raised over £1300 in 16 days - this was a very significant grassroots contribution which we will use to push on and spread our message. Thank you.

Can I help with getting your message out locally or nationally?

Or: I have media enquiries?


Please contact us at press@nhssurvival.org


I can’t donate. But I’d like to help?


Great! See the links below to use a quick easy tool to write to your MP and to find out more about various campaigns.

Or get in touch if you have ideas, experiences, or skills you wish to share – we need your help in getting the message out.


Learn more:

http://www.nhssurvival.org

Write to your MP - use our template letter now:

http://www.nhssurvival.org/action.html

 

Disclaimer:


Please note this crowdfunding is in our private capacities. The views expressed here do not represent our employers, the NHS or any NHS organization, any political party, and/or the Government. 


None of the money will go to any registered political party or to any individual other than to reimburse material costs.

story:
Your support in every our project will help us to create whole collection of unique accessories.


Risks and challenges

Probably it is the most relevant paragraph for backer after he has found our project interesting. 
We made enough to be sure about this project. We have a lot of practice with working with carbon fiber and other composites, we have also established a strong relationship with our materials suppliers, and chosen not one, but few cnc machinists to be sure about COTOCUBE production. We are prepared not only theoretically, we made few dozen of experimental dice and all of them came out perfect. 
We are feeling confident as we already have experience with complete Kickstarter project which passed well and smoothly.

story:
How far will you go?


Technology has taken over society. People connect with one another through email, social media updates, text messaging, etc. Human contact and adventure in the great outdoors have taken a back seat in many people's lives. But, that's about to change with Ripler. This revolutionary app will encourage people to rediscover the world around them as they explore their way to world domination. A project this large needs help from the crowdfunding community. That's why we've launched an IndieGoGo campaign to raise $25,000. Funds received will help us complete the free app and make it available for everyone to enjoy on iOS and Android devices.





Press coverage




...



Here's how it works



Give us your name, or make up a new one! Either way, we'll use a little code to convert your name into a unique colour.





Go exploring to expand your riple. Wether you're climbing a mountain, riding a wave or just commuting: Every step you take makes you bigger in Ripler.



Trainer bots show you how to defeat other players. Recruit or destroy players to keep moving forward.





"Exploration is a dirty game."

Tahir Shah



Reach the flag to win


Use the grid to attack your opponent.




Break through defences to claim the flag.



Bigger riples have better defences. 
Use powers to give you an edge.





"A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to it's old dimensions."

Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr



Powers




Use Portals to bypass your opponent's defenses.


Build Walls to prevent attackers from using Portals.


Use Scouts to grow twice as fast.



Teams


"To win the game, start a team and take over the world."

Finn Fleming




How far will you go?


Special thanks


Johnny Vetterli
Dante Fleming
Jay Ambauen
Greig Fleming
Sam Steevens
Jordan Schorno
Fabian Müller

x
Team Ripler




Our story


Ripler is a project that Johnny and I have been talking about for the better part of a decade. When I first fell in love with the idea, I was utterly oblivious to the vortex of obstacles and challenges that lay ahead. The core idea behind Ripler has always been to encourage people of all ages to break out of their daily routines and take that extra step that might just lead to something amazing.



"Imagine there are no countries."

Johnny Vetterli


Scores of men and women from both my work and social lives have expressed some degree of resentment towards technology in recent years. People are afraid that things like real human contact and adventure and love and exploration are all becoming secondary to our email inboxes and news feeds. Many of us don't speak with or even acknowledge strangers anymore. Never in the history of the human race have our lives been so intimately and intricately intertwined, yet we reject the unfathomable beauty that lies all around us. It is as if we are imprisoned by the strict expectations and routines that have been imposed upon us all.


Our mission


We aim to break the mould. Ripler is a direct challenge to human nature. Help us reconnect people with eachother and their surroundings in a way that's never been done before. Rediscover your world as you explore your way to world domination.

story:
Ember is a strategic card game set in a fantasy world of elemental magic. Players collect cards to form “sets” that they cash in to conjure mythical creatures which they can use to boost their abilities or hinder their opponents. It's a race to the finish as the wizards seek glory by collecting the rarest and most powerful creatures.

With Solo Play and a slew of different play modes, Ember really is fantastic value.

Ember is already at the printers and scheduled for a June 2016 launch!

Summary: You get 112 high quality cards all for the bargain price of £13.

Here's how Ember fits into the magical world of gaming...

  • Multiple ways to play: Ember has a variety of different ways to play based on your play-style. Casual Play, Hardcore, or even Battle Mode.
  • A game of Ember scales based on the number of players; more players equals more creatures which equals more options and strategies.
  • Plays with 2 to 5 players (best with 4 or 5).
  • Fantastic Solo Play mode available (with unique Spell cards).
  • 8+ Group Play: Purchase a second Core Set to allow 8 or even 10 to play Ember at the same time. Double the players means double the monsters - no two games will ever be the same! 
  • The perfect intro game for all the family, based on tried-and-tested mechanics from one of the world's most popular card games. This really is a game you can play with your kids, and they LOVE IT (it's one part Pokemon, one part deck-building game, and one part - take that! - explosive strategy). There are few games out there that scale as well for players of all ages.

  • Intro Game: Ember is a simple game with lots of depth. You can teach it to just about anyone. It's the perfect light intro game you can play before, after, or even during those heavier games. 
  • Many Ways to Play: With a bunch of ways to play, Ember is fantastic value. Try Casual, Hardcore, and Solo modes.
  • Replayability: Ember is a simple game that we still find ourselves enjoying and playing after hundreds of games. 
  • Simple Setup: Set up the pool of creatures according to their Victory Point (VP) score, shuffle the play deck, deal five cards to each player, and play. It's that simple!
  • Fast-Paced: It's a fast, bright and colourful card game; the base game only takes about 20 to 30 minutes to play (Hardcore takes about 15).

To get a magical overview of the game, check out Ember’s rules.  

  • You're getting a great deal! This version of Ember won't ever be released in shops (via a worldwide distribution deal).
  • You're supporting a UK game developer.
  • We need your help getting Ember made. The more people who pledge, the more stretch goals we can include, making the game better for everyone! 
  • Ember has proven to be exceptionally popular with younger gamers - this really is the perfect game to play with your kids - or your partner (who we know hates games - this could be the one that tips the scales and finally gets them interested). Hey. It could happen.
  • If you like magical spells and mythical creatures - Ember is for you.
  • If you like variants of traditional card games then you have to buy this game!

Alternatively, check out these walk-through videos.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B13WnW3MmHQ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_QCp8l_bE2c

Ember came third on the SmarterBacker Badger Index. A great feat considering the competition it had that week. This absolutely is a seal (well, badger) of quality.

Angel of Dice

Kentucky Bored Gamers

Player2Cast

Giant Brain

As well as entrance to Alastor's School of Wizardry, you can receive the following fantastic reward / pledge levels.

District 31 already has a retail outlet web-store so we’re no stranger to shipping lots of orders. When the project is complete, we’ll have our packing munchkins pop each order in a shipping box and ship it to you via Royal Mail. You’ll have it a few days later in the UK or about 5 to 10 days later in the rest of the world. We’ve done this a LOT. Really. A LOT. We’re already shipping orders every day so this won’t be any kind of a problem for us. But, by all means, please send chocolate peanuts (our munchkins love peanuts). 

Part of your pledge goes towards shipping your game to you. Shipping is getting ever more expensive, but we’ve subsidized the cost of the postage as much as we possibly can. Shipping to Europe for one Core Set of Ember is £6.10 (so we've given you a £1.50 discount).

Alternatively, get in touch for a location-specific quote on multiple copies.

  • Back us!
  • Add a second copy to your pledge for your most magically-inclined friend. 
  • Tell your friends about the game via the Facebook and Twitter buttons below, or via good, old-fashioned verbal communication (we would also suggest telepathy but we know only a few of you took Madame Tremolet's Psychic Classes!).
  • The more Likes we get, the more Promo Cards we’ll release. Bonus! 
  • Send us your thoughts and feedback in the project's comments section. We want to makeEmber the best game it can be, and you can help us achieve that. 
  • Or simply show your interest in the game by following Ember on Twitter, or by liking it on Facebook. 

Risks and challenges

We are passionate about our games and take our commitment to quality seriously.

We always do our best to create something we can be proud of - from design details all the way to customer service.

Update: Ember is being printed as we speak. Barring world war, zombie invasion, or Attack of the 60ft High Killer Basilisks, we should have copies mid-May and ready for the launch at the UK Games Expo on June 3rd.

We need your help getting Ember made. The more people who pledge, the more stretch goals we can include, making the game better for everyone! 

Ember has proven to be exceptionally popular with younger gamers - this really is the perfect game to play with your kids - or your partner (who we know hates games - this could be the one that tips the scales and finally gets them interested). Hey. It could happen.
If you like magical spells and mythical creatures - Ember is for you.
If you like variants of traditional card games then you have to buy this game!







Alternatively, check out these walk-through videos.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B13WnW3MmHQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_QCp8l_bE2c






Ember came third on the SmarterBacker Badger Index. A great feat considering the competition it had that week. This absolutely is a seal (well, badger) of quality.



Angel of Dice
Kentucky Bored Gamers
Player2Cast
Giant Brain





As well as entrance to Alastor's School of Wizardry, you can receive the following fantastic reward / pledge levels.












District 31 already has a retail outlet web-store so we’re no stranger to shipping lots of orders. When the project is complete, we’ll have our packing munchkins pop each order in a shipping box and ship it to you via Royal Mail. You’ll have it a few days later in the UK or about 5 to 10 days later in the rest of the world. We’ve done this a LOT. Really. A LOT. We’re already shipping orders every day so this won’t be any kind of a problem for us. But, by all means, please send chocolate peanuts (our munchkins love peanuts). 
Part of your pledge goes towards shipping your game to you. Shipping is getting ever more expensive, but we’ve subsidized the cost of the postage as much as we possibly can. Shipping to Europe for one Core Set of Ember is £6.10 (so we've given you a £1.50 discount).
Alternatively, get in touch for a location-specific quote on multiple copies.









Back us!
Add a second copy to your pledge for your most magically-inclined friend. 
Tell your friends about the game via the Facebook and Twitter buttons below, or via good, old-fashioned verbal communication (we would also suggest telepathy but we know only a few of you took Madame Tremolet's Psychic Classes!).
The more Likes we get, the more Promo Cards we’ll release. Bonus! 
Send us your thoughts and feedback in the project's comments section. We want to makeEmber the best game it can be, and you can help us achieve that. 
Or simply show your interest in the game by following Ember on Twitter, or by liking it on Facebook. 







Risks and challenges
We are passionate about our games and take our commitment to quality seriously.
We always do our best to create something we can be proud of - from design details all the way to customer service.
Update: Ember is being printed as we speak. Barring world war, zombie invasion, or Attack of the 60ft High Killer Basilisks, we should have copies mid-May and ready for the launch at the UK Games Expo on June 3rd.

story:
Playable Demo of "tides of existence " V 0.3

Download it here https://we.tl/irFQO49hTO just unzip and play it.

Features of the Game:

- Open World

- Naval Exploration with ships

- Flying Mounts

- Romance

- Trade

- Crafting

- Treasure Hunting 

-Magic spells and sword fighting

We are inspired by  two  classical games "GOTHIC" and  "SID MEIR'S PIRATES"

 

 

WHAT IS TIDES OF EXISTENCE ?

 

Tides of Existence is an open world action RPG game .  Played in a third person perspective, players control the outcast  Alec Dorian . An ex-inquisitor, who rebels against inquisition . In the game players try to solve the mystery of the ""old ones"" using blades and magic while the player can talk and interact with  non-player characters. 

The player can level up protagonist character by earning experience points through completing quests ,defeating enemies exploring  secret islands and underwater spots  . 

Each time player levels up, they receive points to spend on the character's attributes.  The game is set in Antissa , one of several countries in the mythical continent Veles. In Tides of existence every building has interior settings and  there is no invisible walls to block your way.

" Download and see your self  https://we.tl/PD2NnJpeSI"

 

 

 

OPEN WORLD

 

In the huge realm of Tides of Existence, you will explore your own path to survive. 

Become an outcast , a surviver , hone your blades, tame your beasts, and learn more to sharpen your spells. 

To overcome your doom you need to be a legend.  Do their dirty jobs, or fight for the poor, it's your decision. 

Just remember, the longest day must have an end. 

 

 

INQUISITORS

 

In mythical lands of Veles there is a country called Antissa controlled with the iron claw of inquisition. Inquisitors known with their magical powers and zealous

 anger against whom they mark as infidel.

They see themselves as guardians... Guardians who protect the laws of the gods. Alec Dorian was one of the exceptions among them.

Someday he realized that he was not on the good side. An ancient race called "Old ones" was behind all evil actions of inquisition. 

You have the same powers that inquisitors have... With one vital difference, they have gears to amplify their powers. Search the burried secrets

of the "Old ones" to match them.

 

STORY

 

In a world it's already hard to survive, with the Inquisition on your back, you'll face with the "Old Ones". An ancient terror, ready to surge Tides of Existence .

 

GAMEPLAY

 

T. Z. Yalcin 

I am an indie game developer with a degree in economics. Gaming was always my passion. Years passed this passion of playing turned into making it. After having worked at a bank for 8 years, I had enough. I quit my job at the bank. I worked in various simulation companies to learn different game engines. Still working in a simulation company in Metu Technopolis in Ankara, Turkey.

story:
Morrain

Morrain is an open world survival RPG where a gamer has to survive and make decisions each of which affects the development of the events and final outcome of the game.


Morrain is the game for those who like twisted plots, hardcore game play and the world exploration.

We were inspired by such masterpieces as TES: Morrowind, Dark Souls 2 and Gothic 2.

Platforms: Windows/ Mac/ Linux. 

Languages: English, French, Russian.



Features:

  • Entirely manually created unique game word without procedural generated terrain, trees, etc

  • Nonlinear gameplay and multiple endings of the story

  • Fast paced combat system, where each missed hit can cause fatal consequences

  • Maximum close-to-reality survival conditions, need of food, rest, warm clothes and medical supplies

  • Atmospheric and thrilling music


Why flexible?

Flexible campaign has been chosen as the work on the game is launched at full length, but your help can speed up the development, improve it in all the aspects and will allow to release the game as soon as possible.


“What am I investing into?” is the question you’ll ask. All the money will be put into the development of the game, which includes:

  • Employing people on full-time basis

  • Voice-overs, soundtrack and work on sound effects

  • Localization in English, French and Russian languages

  • Purchase of all the required software

  • Miscellaneous

  • Taxes


The sooner we raise money, the sooner we can hire additional staff which will directly accelerate development of the game.



Morrain is a prison island, located to the north of the mainland, where the action of the game takes place. For more than 300 years, criminals from all corners of the Empire have been taken here. Lately, unsettling reports about the outbreak of an unknown disease started to arrive.


As it also turned out, all the prisoners escaped from the prison and dispersed around the island.


The protagonist is a combat medic. He comes to the island as a member of the medical corps to investigate and prevent the spread of the mysterious disease, which has taken lives of lots and lots of people.


Imperial Secret Expedition (ISE). ISE agents arrived on the island, cordoned it off and declared it a quarantine zone, blocking all the communication with the mainland. The purpose of their arrival is unclear as disease elimination doesn’t come under the jurisdiction of ISE.


The Church. They have been treating the disease before the arrival of the medical corps and ISE agents until the situation ran rampant (has taken alarming dimensions). The church is dissatisfied with the arrival and intervention of the medical corps and ISE.


Different gangs.  A mob called together from all the corners of the Empire. They try to survive in this inhospitable climate, struggling against hostile environment and government agents. They scattered around the island and have a dream of taking control of the island, and better still – escaping from it. The mob is divided into various groups, depending on the blocks they were kept in.


Character progression

There are no skill points or level ups. Our system of skills’ improvement directly depends on the way you use those skills. For example, to run faster and expend less energy you simply need to run more often. At the key levels of skills’ development there open traits which add these or those passive bonuses.


Variations of the plot and quests: In Morrain, there are several endings of the game. All of them depend on decisions and actions of a player, made during the gameplay. It refers not only to the main story line, but also to additional quests.


There are no fedex quests and quests of «Kill 10 rats and now kill 10 stronger rats» kind. All the quests contribute to the unfolding of the plot and give some information about the world of the game.


Enemy AI

We will try to make Enemy AI in such a way that the pattern of his behavior won’t be too predictable for a player. This means that enemies will flank the character if they are in groups, use various bombs and pistols, run to the safe passing distance, hide behind the backs of a companion in case they were injured. And it’s not the end!


Dangers and survival methods:

Apart from gangs and wild animals, hostile environment, diseases, supercooling, famine, exhaustion, uncured wounds, intoxications pose hazards to the life of the protagonist.

                                           


Diseases: Diseases in Morrain are common ones, but can be fatal. The character can contract a disease from cold weather, bites of wild animals, uncured wounds, raw meat and unknown plants. These diseases start with symptoms, and then, in the course of time, impair health and skills of a player. The player has to determine the diagnosis according to symptoms and cure himself, and if he doesn’t do that in time, the progressing disease will definitely lead to death.

                                           


Medicaments: the player can resist all the calamities, making and using various serums and drugs. But you should be careful with what and how you treat that. Drugs have side effects and lots of them are addictive, so you need to take them sensibly.

                                                     


Negative effects: Negatives effects can temporary and permanent. Temporary effects such as tiredness, famine, sickness and others are cured with the rest, food and medicines. But the character can suffer from the consequences of severe wounds and drug addiction in the whole course of the game.

                                         


Apart from physical wounds, the character can get moral injuries. For example, if you “feast” your eyes with corpses for a loooong time, it might have bad consequences.        

                                                   


In addition to that, you can get addicted to eating human meat. Yes, yes, you read that right, there’s too little food on the island.

                                         


Music and immersion devices.

Music has great significance in the game, as it, along with the visuals and gameplay, creates the atmosphere and helps to plunge into the game deeper. And because of that, for every single type of location and for specific events there has been written a suitable soundtrack. Here’s one example of that:


Why do we need your help?

Our project is rather big and is made by common efforts of 5 people:

  • Game/level designer - Maxim Sidash

  • Programmer - Alexander Trefilov

  • 3D Artist –Characters/Animation - Sergei Suharev

  • 3D Artist – Objects/Architecture - Ivan Reznik

  • Composer - Andrey Grebenyuk


As we have minimum working staff, we have chosen flexible. We need money for:

  • English VO. The game needs memorable, charismatic voices

  • Localization in three languages: English, French and Russian

  • Development and additional staff. We need two artists for locations, objects and characters, two 3D artists for object modeling and animation


Rewards


Risks

What happens if we don’t raise enough money?

Don’t panic, guys! We’ll release the game anyways, even if it requires selling our programmer’s kidney…or two! But your help will make it better in all the aspects and we’ll finally have a chance to eat.


When will the game be released?

It directly depends on the amount of raised funds. If we raise 10 000 dollars, the development of the game will take a little longer than if we get the budget of a small country. We do our best to release it as soon as possible (and to let our programmer enjoy life with the whole set of organs) and to make players enjoy the game.


On our projects’ page (see links below) we will systematically post new information, art and video about the things we have done and we are working on at the moment.


Stay tuned, folks!


Join us!

Even if you cannot donate money (that makes us sad, especially our programmer (greedy bastard doesn’t want to sell his kidney!!!)) , tell your friends about us. The more support we get the faster and better we’ll make out project work. Any help, in any form of it is highly important to us, whether it’s your money, love or hugs!


Thank you for supporting us!

Morrain Dev Team

story:
Your digital placard

 plaMobi is a real-time map classified mobile application that enables you to advertise yourself virtually on the go.

 It provides a wide range of options to help and resolve your needs in the location (Geolocation) you are in. Through plaMobi, you can either post and seek help or provide a helping hand to the one who needs it, with your mobile anytime.

 Please visit us at  www.plamobi.com

Advertise yourself on move


Everything is perfectly organized

Whenever you advertise or post something, it gets updated instantly in the map. The users who have installed plaMobi can browse through the map and see the post, or create filters to receive specific post update notifications. You can create multiple filters like "Cab”, “House for sale”, “Chinese food”, “iPhone accessories”, etc.

plaMobi plays a significant role in helping you and assuring all your needs are met in the location you are in.

Use case: Let’s consider you have entered a new city and need a cab to reach your destination. You post a message saying “Looking for a cab to ABC location”. The post gets updated in the plaMobi map, and notification is sent to the plaMobi users who have created Geolocation filter to receive cab enquiries or updates. A cab driver or travel agency notices your post either by receiving a notification or browsing through the plaMobi map, and reaches you to help.In stead of cab, consider you are looking for a hotel room to stay on the location you are in and you have posted the same in plaMobi. The inn manager can notices your post and reaches you to help. So, any need on the spot can be mutually exchanged with plaMobi.


Notifications

Geo-boundary Notification: To receive post updates from the Geolocation you are currently in. The maximum distance that can be covered in Geolocation is 50 miles i.e. you will receive post update notifications from the areas that are within 50 miles from the location you are currently in.

Use case: Geo-boundary notifications feature comes very handy on any real time Emergency scenarios like say you are driving from point A to point B in a highway and your car breaks down. You put your status on the plaMobi. A nearby mechanic can notice and contact you or come to help you. Any such emergency posts can be noticed by the passersby or any one on your location who can give you an helping hand.

With this app you can:

► Post a message Example: #Looking for a #cab or best south #Indian #restaurants, seeking help in case of emergency. (or) Make an announcement of your services or advertise your business. Example: A shop owner can post a message saying "Get Flat 40% off on #apparels and footwear for men, women and kids". Post any such messages with hashtag supported.

► Create specific filters to receive status update notifications. Example: "Cab”, "Freelance PHP Programmer”, “Chinese Food”, “Lemon Tea”, etc.
Use Case: Let’s consider you have set a filter as "Spring rolls" and enabled Geolocation based notifications. A restaurant that is in the same Geolocation updated its status as "Today's Special: Spring rolls with garlic sauce". plaMobi will send a notification about the restaurant status to your mobile. You can reach the restaurant and enjoy the spring rolls.

► Perform typical Classified search to find plaMobi users current post updates that meet your needs apart from browsing through the plaMobi map.

► Initiate chat conversation or Email or make a phone call (if the user allowed to show the contact number) to seek or provide help/service. This feature enables you to have real-time interaction with the people who might be in the same vicinity, but don’t know each other.


Privacy

plaMobi honors your privacy. It does not reveal any information about you or your location until you disclose it personally. You can initiate a chat or make a phone call and convey your needs to the other person. If you notice misbehavior or feeling uncomfortable with a person, you can block the person immediately. The blocked person can no more reach you through the app and see your post anymore.

plaMobi honors your privacy. It does
 not reveal any information about you or your location until you 
disclose it personally.  You can initiate a chat or make a phone call 
and convey your needs to the other person. If you notice misbehavior or
 feeling uncomfortable with a person, you can block the person 
immediately. The blocked person can no more reach you through the app 
and see your post anymore.

story:
Vortrov is a fun, two player card game where Aliens, Monsters, and Robots fight to the finish! The game is easy for younger children to learn, yet interesting enough for older players to enjoy.

If you've ever played War or Rock Paper Scissors, then you already know how to play Vortrov. The premise of Vortrov is simple: win more matches than your opponent until they are completely out of cards. This is the perfect game for a rainy day, a road trip, playing around a campsite, or while traveling to a campsite in the rain. Games can range in length, depending upon the luck of the draw and when certain cards are played.


There are three suits of cards: 

Red - Aliens

Yellow - Monsters

Blue - Robots

Red always beats Yellow, Yellow always beats Blue, and Blue always beats Red. Each suit character card has a number from 1 to 15. In the event of both players drawing a card of the same suit, the card with the higher number wins.


There are also challenge cards which do special things. You can automatically win no matter what your opponent plays, you can automatically lose, run away, and more. There is also a Vortrov card. When this card is played, the opponents, switch hands! If your opponent was almost defeated with only two cards remaining, then they played this card... uh oh! Now YOU are the one left with only two cards. Good luck! A comeback is possible, but it may take some time.


What We Need & What You Get

The more backers we get, the higher number of decks we can print, which brings the price per deck down by quite a bit. Some of our perks include your own deck of the game in cellophane, the game in a custom tin, original signed art from the game, and more!

The Impact

My wife and I enjoy playing card games with my kids, as do many families. We've played Uno and other similar games for years, and they are very fun. I wanted to make a card game that had a similar feel, was simple enough for young children to play, yet interesting enough to make it fun for older players. The Vortrov card can turn the game on its head, if played late in the game. In my testing sessions, it helped make the game a lot of fun. It also gives a player who seems to be losing some hope that things could turn in their favor at any time.

Risks & Challenges

Getting the cards printed and mailed out to everyone will take a little bit of money. How much it costs depends on the size of the print run, which depends on the contributions on IndieGoGo. The more people that contribute, the higher the print run. These cards are all drawn by hand on paper, then scanned into the computer for coloring and final layout. The process takes time, and there are 45 character cards that are all unique. It's a fun process though!

If the campaign hits its funding goal and goes beyond, I will create alternate versions featuring different characters. Maybe something like Dragons vs Unicorns vs Elves?

If you can't contribute

I totally understand! You can still help out though by sharing the campaign with others, and by letting people know about the game! Thank you!

story:
What is RevolVR?

RevolVR is a set of revolutionary wireless VR controllers, that were made for gamers and with developers in mind. They provide the most natural and immersive experience in Virtual Reality games at an affordable price. Our controllers are compatible with mobile devices and VR headsets, have super low latency, easy setup, compact and ergonomic design.

Our main focus has been on the hardware and software of the VR controllers. In addition to this we wanted to share our love for VR gaming that is why this project is opensource and even openhardware. This means that upon the success of our campaign, we will provide full documentation on how to make your own cool RevolVR - compatible gun controller. Of course, you have the option to pre-order our high quality controllers, ready for action straight out of the box.

We will provide full documentation to the public, as well as our opensource SDK and free plugins for cross-platform 3D engines (Unity3D, Unreal, etc.). Also providing a few demo games and examples, so even young developers with low experience will be able to make games for our RevolVR controllers. Naturally, people who participated in this campaign will get all materials much earlier than rest of the world.

By supporting our campaign you'll be helping us to bring new unique                     Virtual Reality experiences of shooting action.

Key features, making us different:

 Compatible with Virtual Reality headsets & smartphones!

 Affordable - two wireless VR controllers for $49.00 only!

 Intuitive - just take it into the hands and you are ready to play!

 Absolutely wireless solution - no more mess with the wires! 

 Multiplayer- play with your friends in the same room or across the globe!

 Instant action - our products are ready for action in 10 seconds! 

 Ergonomic design, small form-factor and low power consumption!

 Both hardware and software of these controllers will be OpenSource!


RevolVR devices are compatible with:

  • Android 4.0 (5.0+ for best performance) smartphones & tablets
  • iOS 7.0 (8.0+ for best performance) smartphones & tablets
  • Google Cardboard, Samsung Gear & Other mobile headsets*
  • PC headsets (Oculus, Razer OSVR, HTC Vive, etc **)
  • Windows 7, 8, 10 support
  • Mac support in the near future
  • Linux support in the near  future

* Some smartphone headsets may require simple modification.

** Desktop headsets require Spectator module attached.

When we reach our goal together, we will be making RevolVR an OpenSource product for everyone to use and enjoy!

Why are we so confident in RevolVR technology?

We have a working prototype, and we are know that our technology will work and satisfy even most demanding customers. We have sent some RevolVR Alpha prototypes to bloggers & youtubers and we received a lot of positive reviews and responses. Remember, these reviews are covering our simple RevolVR Alpha prototypes, our consumer version of the product performs much better and has 4 dimensions of freedom: X, Y, Z and tilt, and uses Bluetooth connection.

You can find all reviews of  Alpha prototypes on our website, with more reviews appearing each week: http://revolvr.co/reviews.php

Check out how our Bluetooth version controller performs:


The Impact You making

With your help we can make VR controllers accessible to anyone, to provide a device that is compatible with mobile and VR headsets, affordable, opensource and openhardware. You can make a difference to bring better control for Virtual Reality.This is truly a great gift for any Virtual Reality enthusiasts and to newcomers, wanting to try new experiences in Virtual Reality worlds. We are planning to create a lot of fun multiplayer games to be played with our controllers, so be sure to get couple devices for your friends and family members!

Risks & Challenges

As in any adventure there's always some risks and challenges involved. However, we, the RevolVR team, are confident that we will deliver a high quality final product, satisfying every customer. We had a "small scale" production of prototypes that we have sent to reviewers, so we already know most of the common issues can happen at a production phase and know how to solve them. Currently, we have agreements with suppliers of electronic components, casings and everything we need to start mass production of high quality devices.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing through your social networks is a great help and can really contribute in getting awareness

Follow us on our Twitter page
RevolVR facebook page
our website www.revolvr.co
You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Tired of trading your used games only to get pennies on the dollar?  Well we are here to change all that! Welcome to GameSlam, your player driven virtual used game marketplace!

  • My Name is Cliff, myself and my 11 year old son love playing video games!  What we don't love is what happens when you try and trade in your unwanted games at a traditional retailer! It's a losing game...

  • After the second time trading a game less then 3 weeks old and getting terrible value I came up with idea for GameSlam. The winning way!

  • If you have unwanted games laying around then so do other gamers in your area! Thousands and Thousands, WHY NOT TRADE WITH OTHER GAMERS! Well now YOU CAN! and maybe meet some cool new gaming friends!

Welcome to GameSlam!!  

See the GameSlam app walk-thru here: https://youtu.be/eWQrwYPXxjI

What We Need & What You Get

  • The App is almost complete and we need your help bringing THE ULTIMATE GAMERS APP to the market!
  • Not only will you be among the first to get this awesome app but you can also receive unique GameSlam merchandise, special recognition badges for your personal GameSlam profile but also invitations to GameSlam events just like the one we held in Dallas.  Link to video here: https://youtu.be/fsbMlG9a3So
  • Funds raised will be used for helping to bring this GAME CHANGING App to the market and provide gamers with a valuable tool to make their gaming experience easier and better!

The Impact

Your support is critical in changing the face of the used game market!

  • Too many corporations have gotten rich by taking advantage of the Gamer, well with GameSlam, THOSE DAYS ARE OVER!
  • If you are serious about gaming and you are serious about saving and earning money and meeting other gamers in your community, WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

Risks & Challenges

  • The challenge is educating the Video Game consumer that there is a better way to Trade, Buy or Sell used games! Your contribution will help us reach the gaming community.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute that doesn't mean you cant help us spread the word about GameSlam!

  • Help us make some noise on Social Media and spread the word about GameSlam!
  • Indiegogo has awesome sharing features to spread the word about this Game Changing App!!  

GAMESLAM, by Gamers for Gamers!  Thank you for your support!

 

GET YOUR AWESOME GameSlam T-Shirt TODAY for only a $30 contribution! 

 

 

ADDITIONAL LINKS

www.TradeGuruinc.com

www.GameSlam.com

www.facebook.com/GameSlam

story:
I am Errol Doris Sr...

One of the early pioneers of Digital Printing, that launched one of the First Billboard Printers into the USA, Central and South America markets. I also developed VideoShopper, the first Digital Video Movie Rental Club in Supermarkets and Variety stores. In 2000, we launched the BEL2000, the first Large Format, Hi-Res, High-Speed Digital Printer for the Packaging and Display Industries.

In short, I built my career as a Pioneering Digital guru.

I also worked in the Retail Industry and developed printing methods to Sell and Promote famous movies like Top Gun, Crocodile Dundee, Lady and the Tramp and many others, in Bookstores, Drugstores, Department stores. I also pioneered Big Auto Show graphics and Exhibit Systems for the NFL.

I am a game designer and produced board games in-store retail and incentive Games and Promotions for Wal-Mart and Citicorp Retail Services.

Brandoodles is a first-of-a kind Game that transitioned from a simple Hangman style paper game, to a Parlor Board Game to a Cash Register game, to a Mobile Game and now a Digital Game Show that will be streamed 24 hours a day.

 

 

 

Brandoodles is the first and only game with a format similar to Wheel-of-Fortune game, that has never been exploited. Wheel-of-Fortune players are natural Brandoodles Players...with a new format for a 24/7 audience that gives them real skin in the game by being able to go online and redeem the prize they won.

Best of all everyone that plays Brandoodles is a Winner. The size of the win varies only by discount (10% - 99%) and based on one's "agility" to login the fastest... to win the highest discounts.

By first engaging Retailers and Advertisers who have under utilized the power of the Cash Register Front face,  and with only a tiny arsenal of 100 advertised product Brands...used as the game puzzles...displayed for as little as 91 days in 1,000 stores, we are poised to generate  half a billion dollars in gross revenue by charging the lowest ever digital ad rate at $0.005 per click.

Brandoodles was first developed in the 1990's as a Hangman Style Supermarket Trivia Game. Customers would play the game by filling in the missing letters of Famous Brands on pieces of paper and they would win those brands as prizes. Most of them played the game with high excitement, but the technology only existed with coupons and was not wide reaching enough to catch on nationally.

By 2015, the advent of Mobile Technology opened the doors to being able to expose Brandoodles nationally to over 230 million people who participate in game play every day. The key to "winning" is to redeem the Cash Register "prize" as a big discount (10% - 99%) for products that may not even be sold in the store they visited. This concept opens the crossover advertising flood gates to every one of the 4.5 million locations with Cash Registers. With mobile redemption each customer will gain access to hundreds of other products offering Big Discounts without first spending a dime.

Imagine the obvious...being able to get a big discount off of a pair of expensive shoes from a Drugstore Cash Register receipt, or a deep discount off of a Ford Automobile from a Hardware Store Cash Register receipt or a Household Appliance off of the Cash Register receipt of a McDonald's restaurant. The possibilities are endless. This is not a Groupon-type "push" strategy. This is Brandoodles "pull" strategy. Everyone is bound to be a winner with no obligation to spend anything.  

 

Big Idea and Big Reward

We are the first to market this concept with Patent Pending protection. 

We are launching this unheard of phenomenon at the highest retail level stores to the lowest. In fact. Wherever there is a Cash Register, there is an Advertising Opportunity. So it does not matter the hierarchy of the Retailer. Everyone is fair game. The last and only time a phenomenon like this was launched was during the S&H Green Stamps era that lasted over 50 years.

Our confidence of success is high. Why? The average big retailer houses 35,000 - 45,000 products and many of the smart ones have offered online sales. Yet, there are over 500,000 products that never see the light of day sitting alone in their warehouses. By promoting 1,000,000 clicks for $0.005 per click, the possibility of exponentially increasing the revenue stream is "huge" beyond belief, using an existing technology that cannot be replaced with "Mobile Cash" for close to a decade from now.

You will be funding a new and unique category of Retail Advertising and Marketing through Game Play. See us at http://belcomcorp.com

What We Need & What You Get

We need a minimum of $25,000 to get the project to the next step which is to complete the algorithm and implement the website. Why so little you may ask? We are professional graphic artists, game development specialists, sales professionals, marketers and finance people. See http://belcomcorp.com/our-team/. We have operated this project on a shoe string budget from day one. We are all invested in making this project a success and have spent from our own resources to get it to this point.

We are so confident of the success of this project that in our business plan, a revenue stream will develop within the first three months post implementation. Once that occurs, we will initiate the working budget to encompass the new sales and tech staff we will need to run the operation.

Perks

We will honor each backer with a Limited Certificate of Appreciation that will be signed and numbered by me, the Founder, Developer and CEO.

I will also provide a specially designed Brandoodles Tee Shirt that will be limited only to backers of this project.

I am also a Artist and I have prepared a selection of a Limited Edition of Signed and numbered Pop Art Lithographs for each backer at their respective levels. The originals of these Lithographs have never been seen before and will only be available to backers.

If we do not reach the entire goal we will continue to fund the project from our own pockets, as we have been doing. We are confident in the success of this project and need just a little push uphill to get it to start to gather steam as it rolls along the path to victory!

The Impact

In my work history I have positively impacted the lives of millions of people. Beginning with the artists who slaved over hand painting billboards, back drops and murals, to the limitations of printing small displays with expensive and outdated technologies versus my involvement to produce accurate, fast turnaround, lightning speed printing processes.

I have no regrets for not having gotten rich in the process and to be able to fund this project myself. What I did learn from my experiences is that licensing someone else's technology for a short term can lead to financial suicide. Imagine that I have done three major things in my career, developed markets and methods and suffered when the license expired and "Big Corporate" stepped in and acquired everything leaving only the ashes to us.

My solution was to Copyright, trademark and patent everything.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk we have is being late to market. The challenge we face is not being able to fund this properly in the long run. Most of what was stated before encompasses our S.W.O.T analysis:

STRENGTH:  Patents Pending for the Use, Apparatus and Methods to promote brands to reach potentially 60 million people a day.

WEAKNESS: Lack of Funding to fully implement the project.

OPPORTUNITY: Access to 4.5 million potential Retail Partners.

THREATS: Delays that could prevent being First-to-Market.

Other Ways You Can Help

If it not possible to provide funding, could you please help us spread the word in your Social Media circles? We would be forever grateful for that. 

We believe that word-of-mouth and casual networking could help to propel this project to success.

Thank you so much.

You will be funding a new and unique category of Retail Advertising and Marketing through Game Play. See us at http://belcomcorp.com

What We Need & What You Get
We need a minimum of $25,000 to get the project to the next step which is to complete the algorithm and implement the website. Why so little you may ask? We are professional graphic artists, game development specialists, sales professionals, marketers and finance people. See http://belcomcorp.com/our-team/. We have operated this project on a shoe string budget from day one. We are all invested in making this project a success and have spent from our own resources to get it to this point.
We are so confident of the success of this project that in our business plan, a revenue stream will develop within the first three months post implementation. Once that occurs, we will initiate the working budget to encompass the new sales and tech staff we will need to run the operation.
Perks
We will honor each backer with a Limited Certificate of Appreciation that will be signed and numbered by me, the Founder, Developer and CEO.
I will also provide a specially designed Brandoodles Tee Shirt that will be limited only to backers of this project.

I am also a Artist and I have prepared a selection of a Limited Edition of Signed and numbered Pop Art Lithographs for each backer at their respective levels. The originals of these Lithographs have never been seen before and will only be available to backers.
If we do not reach the entire goal we will continue to fund the project from our own pockets, as we have been doing. We are confident in the success of this project and need just a little push uphill to get it to start to gather steam as it rolls along the path to victory!

The Impact
In my work history I have positively impacted the lives of millions of people. Beginning with the artists who slaved over hand painting billboards, back drops and murals, to the limitations of printing small displays with expensive and outdated technologies versus my involvement to produce accurate, fast turnaround, lightning speed printing processes.
I have no regrets for not having gotten rich in the process and to be able to fund this project myself. What I did learn from my experiences is that licensing someone else's technology for a short term can lead to financial suicide. Imagine that I have done three major things in my career, developed markets and methods and suffered when the license expired and "Big Corporate" stepped in and acquired everything leaving only the ashes to us.
My solution was to Copyright, trademark and patent everything.

Risks & Challenges
The biggest risk we have is being late to market. The challenge we face is not being able to fund this properly in the long run. Most of what was stated before encompasses our S.W.O.T analysis:
STRENGTH:  Patents Pending for the Use, Apparatus and Methods to promote brands to reach potentially 60 million people a day.
WEAKNESS: Lack of Funding to fully implement the project.
OPPORTUNITY: Access to 4.5 million potential Retail Partners.
THREATS: Delays that could prevent being First-to-Market.

Other Ways You Can Help
If it not possible to provide funding, could you please help us spread the word in your Social Media circles? We would be forever grateful for that. 
We believe that word-of-mouth and casual networking could help to propel this project to success.
Thank you so much.

story:
GAME & COMIC  ... 2ART.com

Both games and comics have stories and characters. When loved by the audience the characters become superheroes. It is our goal to cooperate with developers and publishers and create great merchandise and wannahaves for a world-wide audience, hence: for you.

 

COOPERATION is the game!

With this campaign we seek more then just funding to help us reach our goals. We also want to find more game-developers and comic-publishers to cooperate with us worldwide.
We want our website to become a platform. Not for the big monsters in the industry like Marvel or 'Call of Duty' but for all of those great ones that find themselves right in the middle of the market.

In cooperation with our partners we develop the ready-to-print artwork at our graphic design studio using our extensive knowledge in printing. Our creative team will create the final products of which you will see the first items right here in this campaign.
So this defines already two goals of our campaign:

  1. Finding more cooperation partners in the games and comics industry, developing our website to a platform. ***
  2. Funding for the work that will be needed to extend the development of our site and content.

    *** We are also open to produce the 42cm display as a perk for other game-developers seeking funding here at Indiegogo or elswhere!
     

Our partners right now:

GAMES:  Ronimo Games
Ronimo Games is the developer of AWESOMENAUTS.
COMICS:  Sytse Algera / ComicWatch
ComicWatch is the publisher of LEMURIA, CELL, 24/7, AQUA INVICTA, DELTA FOUR and DE VRIES

The perks in this campaign have been created thanks to the cooperation of these partners.
Please support us and ORDER YOUR PERK RIGHT NOW!


Do you want YOUR GAME or YOUR COMIC to be available as merchandise at game2art.com or comic2art.com?! Be so kind to:
1) support us by buying a perk and
2) let your favourite game- or comic developer know about us.
 

Our perks:

  • $ 10 - Thumbs-up for our project. You will receive a digital wallpaper as a thank-you note for supporting our project.
     
  • $ 20 - AWESOMENAUTS - Lonestar cutout 42cm - free shipping worldwide
    Incl. an easel for setting it up.

     

  • $ 20 - AWESOMENAUTS - Penny cutout 42cm - free shipping worldwide
    Incl. an easel for setting it up.

     

  • $ 20 - LEMURIA - Carp cutout 42cm - free shipping worldwide
    Incl. an easel for setting it up.

  • $ 20 - LEMURIA - Lynn cutout 42cm - free shipping worldwide
    Incl. an easel for setting it up.

  • $ 22,50 - PHONECASE with a Lemuria or AwesomeNauts print:

 

 

So where are we right now?!

Today is: August 19. 2016
We are not a startup company. Our company exists since 1992 and has his roots in advertising and printing. So we already earn our hamburger. Meaning: The support you will give us will be used to develop the project.
The concept of the GAME2ART and COMIC2ART website is a new project which we are REALLY very enthousiastic about.
The website is - at this moment - being built and our technicians are solving all the technical issues that run behind the scenes of our website/platform.
The productrange has been created and everything has been checked and tested, so there is no issue with producing perks or shipping them. This comes forward out of our daily business as is.
Partnerships within the games and comics industry have been realised with Ronimo Games and ComicWatch. With this content we will build our first productrange for the website. We are negotiating with other partners already and we are open for any other to come forward!
Productdesign is being done on a daily bases. The perks you see here are the first products (now) ready for production. Of course there will be much more items, but what that will be is our little secret right now.
.... for more (newer) information check the updates tab on this page.
 

The first goal:

Our first goal is set at $ 10.000
Reaching this goal would help us refine our shopdevelopment and extend to one more partner. Covering the costs of additional productdevelopment, more coding and some extra online marketing.

This being a world-wide platform for countless games and comics our stretchgoals can be endless. If well embraced this 'Thing' could be 'Huge' if many of you would kindly support it.

Stretching to $ 25.000
would help us to create more buzz, hiring marketing professionals and adding more content

Stretching to $ 50.000
would help us to take part at the next large games-fair and develop more products

Stretching to $ 100.000
would help us to create a new job, enlarging our team, giving us more power to service you

Stretching beyond $ 100.000
is at this point more then we could hope for but feel free to help us crack this as well.
We would like to create one very large platform for you to find whatever you need when it comes to merchandise of your favourite game or comic. Cracking this level would mean that we could even become more of a platform offering more interesting content and services.

 

The Impact

Will the world change if this gets funded? YES!
At this point there is no-one taking good care of all the games and comics merchandising issues in a way we would. No one is offering a platform to which gamesdevelopers and comicspublishers can connect to. The cooperation-principle we offer gives more possibilities to developers and publishers to go 'live' with nice merchandise. Developers and publishers are missing out on great opportunities and fans are missing out on merchandise they would love to order.

With game2art.com and comic2art.com we offer a service to both parties. With our high-end service of developing and producing the merchandise-items as well as selling it to the end-user we create a platform that will fullfill.
 

It will be great fun! Please support us and ORDER YOUR PERK RIGHT NOW!

You will be safe: We produce our perks in small quantities, sometimes 1 per piece. So ordering a perk will be as safe as it possibly can be because we do not have to wait for any large quantities to amass.

Other Ways You Can Help

You feel us and you think we deserve a little help but you can't or won't spend the money? We appreciate the thought and YES we can use your help:

  • Share this campaign on your facebook
  • Share in on twitter
  • or just tell your friends about it

We appreciate all your support and we sincerely hope to find lot's of it!

THANKS TO ALL SUPPORTERS, SHARERS AND LIKERS
...and a special thanks to you

story:
Super Mixtape

Super Mixtape is a retro physics based rhythm-puzzle-platformer where you guide cassette tape ‘Mix’ across fully reversible 2D world of A-Sides and B-Sides, completing puzzles as you progress to find the perfect beat.

With a nostalgic late 80’s narrative and levels build to a beat that you control, define your own path using refined physics, unique mechanics and a fully interactive soundtrack that shapes the very landscape and its formidable puzzles around you.


- “It throws everything you know about the standard platformer out of the window and creates its own rules.” – Otaku.

- “My favourite game of EGX 2015” – GameGazm.



Super Mixtape Steam Greenlight went live on Christmas Eve 2015 and got the Greenlight on New Years Eve 2015 (8 days).


Super Mixtape: Features

  • World Flip – flip the world, like a cassette, playing forwards and backwards. The Flip Mechanic is the core mechanic of the game.
  • Tumble – Tumble allows the player to correct themselves and rotate in the air. Challenging the rules of traditional 2D gameplay by allowing player rotation. The main character’s facial expression will change depending on his position.
  • Jump and Physics – The jump in Super Mixtape is like no other jump and requires the player to jump from either the left or the right to gain height or distance based on the physics applied to the cassette. Supported by a considered and natural control scheme.
  • Beat Switches – Being able to ‘switch the beat’ remixes the audio in the game and areas of the level will react to the change. The ‘beats’ are colour coordinated with supported differentiating patterns to assist players who suffer with colour-blindness or colour vision deficiencies.
  • Puzzles – Navigate across puzzles in each level.
  • Audio – The audio progresses with you as you progress through the levels.


Super Mixtape: Feedback


Tag Cloud: A selection of feedback that Super Mixtape has received on the Steam Greenlight page.



Super Mixtape: History

Super Mixtape has been in development since February 2015 and has gone through multiple iterations before reaching this point. A 'Feature Rich' prototype level of the game was shown to the public at EuroGamer (EGX) September 2015 in Birmingham, UK, on a double wide booth, and was extremely well received.

Super Mixtape EGX Write Up

Super Mixtape is currently being developed by one developer, and was featured on The Square Enix Collective website for feedback.

Super Mixtape on The Square Enix Collective





Gameplay

“Throughout the design and construction of the game I have spent a lot of time thinking about the unique mechanics and elements of the game that create the overall experience.”

As you progress through the game, your aim as a player is to traverse 'Mix' across the musical landscape to collect keys and unlock doors, allowing you to progress through the beat.


Mechanics, physics and rules of 'Mix'


"Within Super Mixtape, from the beginning, I wanted the main character 'Mix' to behave like a physical cassette and have some basic 'rules'"

  • You can only move when your magnetic strip is touching the ground
  • You can jump from the left wheel (Left Trigger) or the right wheel (Right Trigger) allowing the cassette to jump and behave differently within the physics, giving you more distance or height.
  • When you flip onto the B-Side, the amount of spooled tape is reversed.


The Flip: One of the core mechanics in Super Mixtape, allowing you to flip the world and play backwards through the game with a whole new audio sequence to progress with. The foreground denotes the active side, and the background is the opposite side of the track. The combination of the two sides will help you progress through the game and solve the puzzles.

"If you're one minute into the A-side on a cassette tape, then flip the tape, you have one minute left on the B-Side".





The Jumps & Physics: Another Core-Mechanic in Super Mixtape is the way you jump from either the left side or the right side of the cassette, depending on which trigger/wheel you use to propel yourself into the air. Jumping from the left will make the tape rotate slightly to the right and vice versa when jumping from the right, the tape will rotate to the left. This allows the player to gain either distance or height when moving, and allows for 'Tricks' to be completed when combined with the 'tumble' mechanic.





Puzzles: Using the mechanics of playing as a cassette tape, the core mechanics of the game and being supported by a killer soundtrack, you can navigate through puzzle to puzzle to complete the game.

"Within the puzzles I really spent time thinking and planning how I can teach the player through trial and error on how to complete the puzzles themselves using the taught mechanics. Progressively teaching the player through play".





The Tumble: Whilst moving and jumping throughout Super Mixtape, you have the ability to control your 'tumble' to correct yourself. If you land upside-down, you can use the jumps momentum and tumble to correct yourself and continue on your path. When upside-down, Mix's facial expression will change until he is corrected.





Super Mixtape: Funding

With Super Mixtape I need to raise funds to finish development of the product. Finance will also be used for fees, backups, marketing and promotional materials, web-server and maintenance.

From the start I wanted to create an interesting game that falls within the ‘fun’ category, but I enjoy games that have a challenge to them, so have been working hard to find a 'happy-balance' with the physics and gameplay within Super Mixtape.

I will be launching a public Trello in the coming weeks for Super Mixtape so that the public can see the developments progress.





Super Mixtape: Reward Details


  • Coffee for the developer: This could be a cup of tea. It will depend on the day which beverage is consumed.
  • Forum Access: All backers purchasing a copy of the game will gain access to the development forums to leave feedback and get involved in the Super Mixtape discussions.
  • Full version of Super Mixtape (Early Bird): The first 100 copies of the game will be at a reduced rate once the game has been released.
  • Full version of Super Mixtape: A copy of Super Mixtape once the game has been released.
  • Gift of Super Mixtape: A steam key for Super Mixtape on release to give to a friend.
  • OST: An original soundtrack from Super Mixtape to listen to at your leisure featuring 10 tracks (minimum) from the game.
  • Name in credits: Get your name in the credits of Super Mixtape under special thanks for helping during the development process.
  • Beta Access: Access to Super Mixtape Beta testing when the game reaches ‘beta’. An opportunity to give feedback and get your hands on a copy of the game before its official release. Beta access will grant you one steam key on release.
  • Alpha Access: Access to the Super Mixtape Alpha testing when the game reaches ‘Alpha’. An opportunity to give feedback whilst the game is in early stages of development and get your hands on a copy of the game before beta access and official release. Alpha access will grant you one steam key on release and access to Beta testing as well.
  • Polygrammatic Beta: access to all beta tests for all future games made by Polygrammatic.
  • Name on website: You name showcased on the Polygrammatic website as a lifetime supporter for all to see.
  • Puzzle designing: spend a day with the developer online making a puzzle for the game to be added to one of the levels.
  • Skype call with the developer: an opportunity to have a skype call with the developer and ask any questions about the development of Super Mixtape, game development in general or anything that you can think of.
  • Fund development of Super Mixtape: You will be held high in the Polygrammatic office as a hero.





Risks & Challenges

The back end of Super Mixtape is complete, and programmatically, the Alpha is 80% complete. The menus, options and levels need to be created, or finish being created. The audio is 60% complete, with the other 40% currently in development. Super Mixtape is being developed using Agile software development processes and is currently on track, and is being developed in Unity 5.

Any additional stretch goals could potentially add a small delay to product development, but it would be a shame not to include a wanted feature. As for the product being released, Super Mixtape has already completed the Steam Greenlight Process and is Planned to be released on Xbox One and Windows 10 Store shortly afterwards.

All updates will be communicated between the Polygrammatic website, Steam page, and Crowdfunding campaign as well as the created backer forums.

Thank you for taking the time to look at my campaign for Super Mixtape, and if you have any future questions, get in touch!
